column2: ["There are many things I can say about my school. I love how close the students are and how well some of the teachers connect with us. We stand together in desperate times. Our Board of Education doesn't give us all we deserve, but we try to make the best with it.", 'My experience at Lakewood High School was great. The teachers are amazing but the school itself could use a little work.  The students do not seem interested in learning but are interested in the rewards the school gives to the students.', "The experience overall is good the teachers are nice the students are nice as well. I've heard that many students that don't go to our school think we're rude and poor but we're not. Most of us respect our teachers and want to learn and graduate. The principle try's her best to make everyone succeed. Our school may not be as big as other schools in NJ but we're proud.", "I love how excepted I am. Since my school is filled with different races and religions, it's rare to feel out of place, or picked at. I recently came out as a transgender male, and everyone accepted me and treated me with respect. This is one of many reasons I never regret going here.", 'All of us from Lakewood High School treat each other as brother and sister,from special ed to honor students,we are all the same.An improvement that could be done is more advanced equipment for students.We have lack of money that doesn’t help us improve our school.', 'Everyone is friendly. Teachers are always available to help, guidance counselors are also ready to help and encourage.', 'Lakewood High School is very good school. Everyone in that school is all one big family. What things need to be change is help that a student may need.', 'I love the fact that our teacher are here for us no matter what. They care so much about our education. The staff are extremely welcoming and helpful and they make school a great place .', 'Lakewood High School is a very friendly and opened environment. The staff is very understanding and helpful.  However I believe our grading system is more focused on testing.', 'Lakewood high school over the years wasn’t a great school to go to many people have told me. But it’s gotten better it’s  great school yeah we have budget cuts but at the moment we have a lot of things I am thankful for. I am involved in many things such as pals, teenpep, cheerleading, class government, student ambassadors. We have a lot of things to be involved in one thing I would like to change is how early we start school. Yeah it doesn’t matter anymore since I am a senior but for the other kids that’s something I struggled with and the Lunch should be better.', 'I like that I got to expirence different cultures. There are many interesting people in Lakewood High School. I also love the way how our other students treat the special Ed. with so much care and support.', "I love the Lakewood High School experience because the teachers and guidance counselors work assiduously to ensure that every student's need is met with utmost professionalism. In terms of change, I wish to see the students more engaged in the classes and activities that go on here.", 'We have many extracurricular activities here. Many students go out and join the clubs or organizations.', 'When outsiders look at my school they see it as just another fish in the pond. In my opinion I feel that our school has a very successful graduation rate and all the students are well engaged in this school activities. Whether it be in athletics or in clubs and organizations.', 'I feel all the teachers at my school try their best to help the students succeed. They all are willing to take the time out of their day and help a student in need. Their teaching styles are all different but still are very engaging for us students.', 'Most parents in  this own do not have transportation or could care less about events which is why their kids continue to get in trouble.', 'Overall the school is okay, the lunch could be better and certain things like cleanliness could be improved. The teachers are great , they really stress the importance of education on the students and push the students to do their best. Another great thing about the school is the resources they give the students in order to reach the next level of their lives. My favorite experience would be taking a math class with my favorite teacher not only because she connected well with the students but she also made one of the hardest subjects for me more easier and understandable. What makes this school unique is the connection students have with there teachers, we all see them like family. If I could do it all over again I would choose this school again because the support of the staff is tremendously helpful and motivating.', "I honestly think that the way you see this school is based on what you let yourself experience here. I love my school and the last four years of my life have been great. As much as people talk down on Lakewood there are so many good things about it. If you're involved in the school activities, that only makes high school better.", 'I like the school but most teachers do not know how to teach. And some teachers have favoritism to the foot ball team but overall it is a good school.', "Some students and teachers don't care in general."]

We have a lot of things to be involved in one thing I would like to change is how early we start school. Yeah it doesn’t matter anymore since I am a senior but for the other kids that’s something I struggled with and the Lunch should be better.', 'I like that I got to expirence different cultures. There are many interesting people in Lakewood High School. I also love the way how our other students treat the special Ed. with so much care and support.', "I love the Lakewood High School experience because the teachers and guidance counselors work assiduously to ensure that every student's need is met with utmost professionalism. In terms of change, I wish to see the students more engaged in the classes and activities that go on here.", 'We have many extracurricular activities here. Many students go out and join the clubs or organizations.', 'When outsiders look at my school they see it as just another fish in the pond. In my opinion I feel that our school has a very successful graduation rate and all the students are well engaged in this school activities. Whether it be in athletics or in clubs and organizations.', 'I feel all the teachers at my school try their best to help the students succeed. They all are willing to take the time out of their day and help a student in need. Their teaching styles are all different but still are very engaging for us students.', 'Most parents in  this own do not have transportation or could care less about events which is why their kids continue to get in trouble.', 'Overall the school is okay, the lunch could be better and certain things like cleanliness could be improved. The teachers are great , they really stress the importance of education on the students and push the students to do their best. Another great thing about the school is the resources they give the students in order to reach the next level of their lives. My favorite experience would be taking a math class with my favorite teacher not only because she connected well with the students but she also made one of the hardest subjects for me more easier and understandable. What makes this school unique is the connection students have with there teachers, we all see them like family. If I could do it all over again I would choose this school again because the support of the staff is tremendously helpful and motivating.', "I honestly think that the way you see this school is based on what you let yourself experience here. I love my school and the last four years of my life have been great. As much as people talk down on Lakewood there are so many good things about it. If you're involved in the school activities, that only makes high school better.", 'I like the school but most teachers do not know how to teach. And some teachers have favoritism to the foot ball team but overall it is a good school.', "Some students and teachers don't care in general."]
column8: ['The school really tries hard to provide the athletics department with things they need and want. The fan support is insane when it comes to male sports, female sports-not so much. Students are really supportive of athletics too. They love to cheer their friends on.', "To be honest, with out extra curricular activities most the students at that school would not be there. The sports and the extra help create an environment for students that they may not have otherwise. There's something for everyone, and no matter what activity you're in you enjoy yourself.", "As far as academics go, classes are split between honors, remedial, and advanced placement. If you are in honors all your classes are honors. The teacher might test you by giving you a little bit of a struggle when it comes to having things due at the same time, but it teaches you time management. The work load is nothing you can't handle, even though while your in the moment you're stressing, in the end when its over you feel really good. Teachers are usually all on one accord, and guidance counselors help you with scheduling so that your school year can go as smoothly as possible.", "Our school is very diverse. Everyone gets along for the most party, despite a few instances. Our classes are a pretty decent size so at some point during the year you all become a family in some type of way. It's pretty cool to be honest.", "Security at school was good, but mostly because the students weren't fighting each other in school or bullying. There may have been a few instances from time to time, but nothing like it was in previous years or in other schools. As far as drugs and alcohol, it's another thing that kids do outside of school.", "To be honest no one likes cafeteria food. There's always the same things and you can clearly see when they've  taken day old taco meat and try top turn it into spaghetti. They had a choice of either a sub/wrap, chicken patty/cheeseburger, pizza, salad, or a hot food which looked pretty scary most of the time. It wasn't that bad, but it wasn't that great either.", 'For some people school is hard, for others it\'s easy. Everyone is different and everyone learns in different ways. To answer the question, "Did Lakewood high school prepare you for the real world?", I would say yes. I feel like every student had that one staff member, no matter what their job was, who was there for them and guided them when they needed it. When it comes to education, the students who wanted to learn did just that, they learned all they needed to and they got good grades. Those who didn\'t want to learn would play around, but everyone had an equal opportunity.', "In Lakewood High School, my graduating class endured what seemed to be the wildest roller coaster of all time! We endured an enormous amount of changes in only four years. We were constantly in and out of dress code, guidance counselors would change from year to year, and every year we had a new principle, yet we made it through. As for the teachers, I commend them. They went through the changes that we did and they stayed with us. Although some students may give them a hard time, the teacher are the one constant thing we had. As far as my last year of high school went, I was pleasantly surprised. Our principle, Marcy Paturzo, was absolutely AMAZING! -as was the rest of our assistant principles. But i couldn't finish this review without giving credit to one really important person at that school, Our assistant principle Douglas Riley, the only principle who was with us for all four years. The students and staff grew closer trying to fight adversity. Some students have created such a relationship with the staff that they consider them family, which I believe is very special. Lakewood High school Is a very unique school,but it wouldn't be anything without it's staff.", "As far as extracurricular activities go, my school has a variety of after-school clubs, that anyone can get involved in. We don't exclude anyone from anything. For instance, if a girl wanted to join the boys Tennis Team, there wouldn't be anything obstructing that from happening. The reason I say this, is because my best friend was that girl, she spoke out and in turn, received a gift from this school; acceptance. I am the most committed to my school's GSA club. It is where students straight, gay, or anyone who is just eager to learn about this society come to. It is where friends are made, and secrets can be kept. Aside from that, I like to take part in just about every club in my school, which involves; the National Honors Society, the Academic Team, Art Enrichment Club, Art Service Club, Cooking Club, Drama Club, the Yearbook Club, Future Business Leaders of America Club, Library Club, R.E.W.I.N.D(Reaching Everyone With Interactive Discussion)  History Club, German Club, and Spanish Club. I am president of FBLA, Stage Crew, Art Club, German Club, and I am my school's Stage Manager for Drama Acts as well. I am also involved in my school's Tennis, and Volleyball team. So obviously, Extra-Curricular Activities are a very prominent part of my life.", "Our teachers really care about the students and want them to achieve not only in the classroom, but in the real world. Most teachers require us to take notes and use computers to find information. The teachers have an excellent knowledge about the subject their teaching so it's important to ask them for help. As a student, my communication skills have gotten better because our teachers require us to present our projects in front of the whole class which is important because that benefits you when you enter the workforce.", "The guidence counselors are always there for you. They will help you with your class scheduling, college choices, and even personal information. For busing we have pleny of transportation. We have buses as soon as school ends, then theres buses for afterschool programs, and buses for students who are involved in athletics that need a ride home when it's dark outside. Over the years our technology has definitly improved. We now have Apple computers, chrome books, ipads,and mac books. In the classroom, our teachers don't even use the black board anymore, we now use a smart board which is an electronic board that helps teachers teach the students.", 'At our school, the students are very diverse. They came from different ethnic groups and nationalites. Students are never inolved in peer pressure since they have the common sense and knows the consequences. Some of the students have a sexual orientation, but the students are accepted here. At our school, we socialize with anybody no matter what.', 'In the cafeteria, they have a variety of salads you can pick from. They give you a small portion of food. For their assorted subs, they used to use white bread and now they switched to whole wheat bread. Instead of cooking french fries they switched to sweet potatoe fries instead. Depite, all the healthy foods we have, our cafeteria still has vending machines that sell chips and beverages.', 'Our school administration had been through alot in all my four years in high school. We had a new principal each year, but this year with the new additions, the students are now succeding academically and the teaching improved. We still have a dress code incase students try to dress any type of way. The our guidence counselors do their best to help students in need such as their scheduling or college career.', 'At our school, no students have never been a victim of bullying nor does the bullying. Throughout the years, our school has always been a pretty safe place and each year we get safer.', "The thing that makes this school unique is the diversity of students attending the school. I've never seen a variety of students with different nationalities before.", 'If you are really smart you get to take Honors and AP classes. Theres a variety of subjects such as business law, financial literacy, photography, and culinary arts.', 'Gospel club, drama club, science club, R.E.W.I.N.D, and etc.', 'This year our football team made it to the playoffs and had reached the semi-finals. Every home game is mostly packed, so we take our sports very seriously.', "The only two sports that always have a huge crowd at games are boys' basketball and football. However, nobody really cares about the other teams especially the girls' teams. On top of that, our sports teams, that aren't basketball or football, are always getting put down by Lakewood's very own students."]

column1: Eagle Academy for Young Men II
column2: ['Great school I’ve truly enjoyed learning for powerful figures who looks like me. This school has kept me globally conscious and globally competitive. This isn’t a typical school, this an extended family all the staffs truly care about the well being and future of each student. This school has encouraged me to pursue higher education.', 'My experience with Eagle is life-changing. My principal prepares us for the real world. As a young black man living in Brooklyn, I already have a target on my back, so my goals are to graduate and to continue the legacy of Eagle and become next eagle alum to graduate from a 4-year institution.', 'This school is meant for Black Men to succeed in life and become the best scholar there is. They push you hard to become a better you every day.', 'Eagle Academy, though limited in diversity and an all-boy school, helps scholars find themselves academically and socially through their journeys from boys to young adults.', 'What I liked were the teachers because they truly care about you and your success and will go the extra mile for you If you put in the work. One thing I would like to see is better preparation for college and life in general.', "Best high school decision ever! I would not have thought of going to an all-boys school would impact my life in such a positive way. I've gained so much knowledge in the classroom and as a young man. Everyone from the principal down to the janitors wants you to succeed after graduating. You are more focused on the lack of opposite sex in the school building. You are able to experience a brotherhood without having to join a fraternity.", 'This is a school that gave me so many opportunities that helped me be who I am and where I am at now today. It has been the best 7 years of my life since I been here from 6th grade. The educators cared so much for us, they wanted us to succeed.', 'Eagle Academy II  is more than a school....we are a family! Eagle has given many of our young men opportunities to advance to the next level of success! So proud of my sons success and achievements at Eagle! Educators, ui byAdministration  and the Parent Coordinator are exceptional! I am a Proud Parent of an Eagle Scholar!', 'The things I like about Eagle Academy is the brotherhood we have with each other where everyone is connected to each other. Its like you can easily fit in with a group of people without feeling shy because you’ll feel accepted as whoever you are. When I first got to Eagle Academy I was shy and had a small circle of friends who were like the opposite of me. However with the activities and clubs  we I was able to fit in groups that were interested. I have made many friends over time being at school and it was a fun experience.', 'I have gone to Eagle Academy II since 6th grade. Being there since being so young, the community becomes more of a family than just staff and students. The sports programs are, simply amazing. I have never experienced a losing season while I was playing for them.', 'My experience at Eagle has not only shaped me for the future but it also has open my mind and gave me a second family.', 'Eagle academy has brought a big change into my life, i been there since middle school they have helped me over come many fears. A main fear is that i was afraid to read in front of anyone for years but my teachers helped me and on top of showing me to over come my fear they showed me resilience.', 'Because its a single gender school', 'I would not have asked to attend any other school. This school taught me more than how to survive school. It also taught me how to survive in life.', 'This school has put me in the best spot to succeed']

column1: Brooklyn High School For Law And Technology
column2: ['The teachers and very encouraging but you also need to apply yourself and not depend on the teachers.', 'there are many issues that need to be fixed in the school to better it. The administration and funding hold it behind.', 'Being at this school is alright. They tend to get things later than sooner. You can have really nice and cool relationships with your teachers, or any other staff memeber.', 'This school is terrible in terms of college readiness. It should have more diversity, and college readiness. It should definitely have good math teachers for the students because the math teachers are very slow with the syllabus. There are always fights going on, and students are all the time wild. Some of them don’t act like civilized human beings. It wasn’t that diverse before, but now it’s pretty much diverse. The school is slow, and needs to be fast paced for students to excel in everything. Teachers don’t care how students become so wild, and disrespectful. This provokes the students to be whatever they want to be. Things like this make an unsafe environment as well.', "Brooklyn High School for law and technology was honestly the best 4 years I've had in my academic life, the friends I've made, I can proudly say will be the friends I event to my wedding, family events and keep for the rest of my life. The teachers are not only kind and loving but they also understand and can relate to everything you have to say to them, almost like a second parent. I would love to see the school get more funding so they can grow in size and make it an overly better experience for everyone who comes there.", 'At Brooklyn High School for Law and Technology it is all about family. Even though there might be some sort of quarrel or fight no school is perfect and BK Law Tech has a great staff that actually cares about the well being of the students.', 'My experience of Brooklyn high school or law and technology is great. There is teachers that not only only push you but set you up for college. The academics in this school is outstanding due to the teaching staff. I also like the athletic programs in this school because coaches set theirs kids up for success by setting standards to make sure they’re doing the right thing and graduate one time with a good average.', 'As a senior my experience have changed though my four year attending this school but it was for the good.Every year my school add more curriculum and after school activity’s with the help of our students and teachers staff.Our sports team is one of the toughest in the city and filled with great players.I like this school because it has thought me a lot and has prepared me for the future.', 'My school experience was overall good, the teachers were nice although some of them did not do a great job maintaining order within the classes. Something that I would of liked to see more is more diversity in terms of sports, the only ones that they offered were track, basketball and volleyball; I wanted to play table tennis since I saw that they had the equipment but they then they just threw the table away.', 'It was a pretty average school it had the bare necessities that i needed so i can learn. The teachers some werent bad.', 'if the school had more funds then more during an after school activities would be put into place allowing students to be more engaged, but over all the school is a great school. the teachers are caring and the work is challenging but all manageable.', "I enjoyed my time but I was happy to leave, if you try to make a connection with the teachers or at least someone then you should enjoy your time. Stay out of drama leave peoples boyfriends alone and don't talk about anyone's kid 🤘🏾🙂", 'I felt unsafe at Brooklyn High School For Law & Technology. There was gang related activities in and out of the school. The safe treated the students two types of ways. One way was that they would be too friendly to the children and the children would take advantage of the teachers, which made it difficult to learn. Another way was that the teachers would be disrespect and would provoke the children to act disrespectful back.', "A little unorganized but a very good school! Teachers are amazing! You are expected to be the best person you can be to be successful. College isn't an option at Law and Tech HS.", "I would say some of the kids are really bad. They don't listen to the teachers. I mean the teachers can't handle them. Also, there are some of the teachers that have favoritism.", 'I like attending this high school because when it comes to us students they give there all. That is appreciated it.', "It was a good high school experience . I'm glad to be a senior in my last year ready to see what the world has in store for me & my future. One chapter done another soon come.  😊", 'There is always a security guard on every floor just in case anything happens.', 'The sports games and competitions are the best things to go watch after school whether its basketball, soccer, volleyball or track and field.', 'The good thing about the school is its small its easy for students to have good relationships with teacher and other staff members.']

column2: ['My experience in Roosevelt High School is defined by the environment and the staff. Roosevelt gives students the means to success it is only up to them to take advantage of opportunities. From early college programs to AP classes to after school activities and extra help, if a student wants to succeed in Roosevelt they are provided with any means necessary. Very diverse school with almost entirely Hispanic and Black population. Some great and influential teachers that go above and beyond for their students. Although Roosevelt High School is a great school, the administration and some of the teachers are uninterested and sometimes fail to consider the thoughts of the students.', "Roosevelt High School is successful in promoting school spirit and pride through numerous activities and events. The teachers see potential in all students and provide assistance whenever it is needed. I would like to see Roosevelt's bad reputation changed as well as the funding for certain clubs and sports to be increased.", "Roosevelt High School has been an overall neutral experience. The school itself is well built and maintained, but some of the teachers and staff are unbearable. The guidance office is a very unwelcoming environment, in which you are usually not wanted in and a handful of teachers do their best to try and impose their beliefs on you. If the answers to your work do not line up with their beliefs, you will not get a satisfactory grade. I've even seen a teacher see a student get bullied in the middle of class, and instead of stopping it, joined in, making the student cry. Although, I cannot take away credit for the good teacher such as History and English. I learned a lot and my skills have been strengthened in history and writing. The lunch is also much better than the middle school lunch. Bigger variety, although a good portion of it is not made well.", 'My overall experience with this school is fantastic. As a current senior, I can definitely say that the memories of this high school will never fade. From a variety of clubs to diverse sports to take, the extracurricular activities never seem to be a burden. Instead,they are joyous pastimes that makes time fly meanwhile benefiting with educational matter. the courses offered in this school can vary a bit more, but the current type of courses should be more diverse. The courses with art aspects is limited and with more creative classes, the students might be able to be more involved in the school. The reason why the students would be more involved is for the fact that the art classes would motivate the students to participate in events hosted by the school. Other wise from that, the academic programs and extracurricular activities are pretty encouraging and beneficial to the students in numerous ways.', 'Roosevelt High School guides you towards college and preparers you for college. The teachers are always around to help you. The there are many clubs and activities.', "In my years at roosevelt high school there has been many ups and downs but for the most part it's been okay.", 'The administration over time have definitely increased the overall efforts throughout the years however I have noticed that there is a lack of consistency implementing new rules and regulations in the school. I do not give full credit to RHS for the decline in gang violence and increased performance of the school. Over the years and gang violence has started to fade away due to the new peaceful generation of kids. The new generation kids that come from better homes have been produced in this neighborhood over the last years, which lead to less violence, less distractions and better scores overall. RHS definitely deserves the recognition for some of the amazing teachers that do an extraordinary job everyday. There are teachers that will motivate you, make sacrifices for you and make sure you will be sent off into this world prepared for life.', 'It’s a great place to be. Very welcoming school my fellow classmates are so kind and helpful. Son much diversity and warm hearted people.', 'It was a long and interesting experience. I learned alot during my time at Roosevelt and meet new people along the way.', 'Roosevelt high school is a promising school, teachers help to approve your academics . Things they could change is tell students certain things in advance.', 'Roosevelt High School is many things but one thing that it is not is dangerous. Many people when they hear about Roosevelt, they have a reaction that is negative. They automatically think that it is the school is full of animals and delinquents but it is not. It is a school full of intelligent kids that are also street smart. I believe that Roosevelt High School can be the best but it still needs a little time to get there first.', 'the extracurricular opportunities at this school are diverse. Every student is different and are intelligent in their own way, so to keep up with the students demands and needs there are the SAD club for students that want to spread awareness or have dealt with similar issues, National honor society for students that like to take leadership and help people, LIFE program for students thats likes international affairs, foreign language club for students that likes to travel and explore , and many more.', "I have done my 3 years at this school and it hasn't been tough, as I seen in films high school was suppose to be scary and annoying. This school taught me a couple things, if you want something fight for it and show your passion, don't ever take one persons advise, and surround yourself with who you want to be. What makes this school unique is that it's small, Roosevelt is a small town, so we basically grew up together. Entering high school with people you knew since pre-k helps the settling in process and helps with less student friction, but of course at every high school there is a steaming hot head waiting to start trouble. I would choose to attend this school all over again because it helped me realize that high school is a safe and great place to be. For me I'd rather go to my school and do a little more work then be on the streets walking around or playing. Your school should be that great if you'd want to spend more hours then you have to in it.", "This school is going on a great path from where it was to where it is now is astonishing. It's up to the student to know whether they want to learn or not. You can get the worlds greatest teacher to teach a student but if they aren't dedicated then there's the issues. From my own eyes I saw a teacher that was stressed from home related issues and still had the strength to teach students that were disrespectful, disruptive, and naughty. They care and if you find one that you feel doesn't, you can see that; yes there may be a lack of dislike with the students personality but never with the work that must be put in. The teachers here never mix their feelings of a childs behavior with how they will teach them. They make everything equal and fair. At the end of the day they know that the students that put fourth the work and passion will truth succeed.", "This isn't the school i wanted to graduate from, i wanted to transfer schools but my father wouldn't let that happen. However the experience was okay.", "Only a few etcher in the school would go above and beyond to help the students. There are also a couple of teachers in the school where teaching isn't their strong suit.", 'All the clubs are run by AMAZING staff !', 'I was a member of the high school band, year book club, prom committee , and was vp of the senior class ! The parents, staff, and underclassmen were all very hands on ! We all worked united not only as a school but as a community. Every year I looked forward to our trip to visit the children and adults with  cerebral palsy. The band, football players, and cheerleaders attended every year ! There is no greater feeling than what was felt when the simple things we do could put smiles on their faces! That was by far my favorite moment in high school.', 'The teachers at Roosevelt high school pushed myself and the members of the class of 2015 to go out and do the absolute BEST we could ! They sat with us day in and out filling out college applications, scholarships, and rooted for us the entire time ! They made us want to become better students and made our High school experience unforgettable', "My feelings tours the staff at my school has always been good I had never had a problem with them I have always try to listen  to what I have to do to achieve my goals. Roosevelt High school may not be the best school However When it comes to speaking about how teacher teach I fell that their great to the point that I fell confident on doing my work right. I have been in special education since I was in 5th grade I am proud to say that special education has help me achieve many goals. I had problem's understanding most concepts but this time in my life I feel very confident to say I have achieved my goal and its been years but this last years have meant a lot for me.\r         The teachers that teach special education are very helpful they had helped me achieve my goal because their interested in making students accomplish their goals of overcoming their defects. Life as we know it is not always perfect and that is something that I have learn this years that what's sounds exciting can be field with problems what am I trying to say,I am trying to say that in 10th grade a hade a teacher that was in special education that was not so teachable and maid me feel not so excited.\r    In Addition I will be  straight forward to saying that my school is not the best district in the state but what is true is that Roosevelt high school tries its best to making students get to their dream. Teachers at Roosevelt do what they can and that is something to admire that they may be difficulties on some of them but at least most of them are wiling to do anything to take me and all the other students in my grade and In the school accomplish their interest as we come out and come in to the field we what to go."]

The guidance office is a very unwelcoming environment, in which you are usually not wanted in and a handful of teachers do their best to try and impose their beliefs on you. If the answers to your work do not line up with their beliefs, you will not get a satisfactory grade. I've even seen a teacher see a student get bullied in the middle of class, and instead of stopping it, joined in, making the student cry. Although, I cannot take away credit for the good teacher such as History and English. I learned a lot and my skills have been strengthened in history and writing. The lunch is also much better than the middle school lunch. Bigger variety, although a good portion of it is not made well.", 'My overall experience with this school is fantastic. As a current senior, I can definitely say that the memories of this high school will never fade. From a variety of clubs to diverse sports to take, the extracurricular activities never seem to be a burden. Instead,they are joyous pastimes that makes time fly meanwhile benefiting with educational matter. the courses offered in this school can vary a bit more, but the current type of courses should be more diverse. The courses with art aspects is limited and with more creative classes, the students might be able to be more involved in the school. The reason why the students would be more involved is for the fact that the art classes would motivate the students to participate in events hosted by the school. Other wise from that, the academic programs and extracurricular activities are pretty encouraging and beneficial to the students in numerous ways.', 'Roosevelt High School guides you towards college and preparers you for college. The teachers are always around to help you. The there are many clubs and activities.', "In my years at roosevelt high school there has been many ups and downs but for the most part it's been okay.", 'The administration over time have definitely increased the overall efforts throughout the years however I have noticed that there is a lack of consistency implementing new rules and regulations in the school. I do not give full credit to RHS for the decline in gang violence and increased performance of the school. Over the years and gang violence has started to fade away due to the new peaceful generation of kids. The new generation kids that come from better homes have been produced in this neighborhood over the last years, which lead to less violence, less distractions and better scores overall. RHS definitely deserves the recognition for some of the amazing teachers that do an extraordinary job everyday. There are teachers that will motivate you, make sacrifices for you and make sure you will be sent off into this world prepared for life.', 'It’s a great place to be. Very welcoming school my fellow classmates are so kind and helpful. Son much diversity and warm hearted people.', 'It was a long and interesting experience. I learned alot during my time at Roosevelt and meet new people along the way.', 'Roosevelt high school is a promising school, teachers help to approve your academics . Things they could change is tell students certain things in advance.', 'Roosevelt High School is many things but one thing that it is not is dangerous. Many people when they hear about Roosevelt, they have a reaction that is negative. They automatically think that it is the school is full of animals and delinquents but it is not. It is a school full of intelligent kids that are also street smart. I believe that Roosevelt High School can be the best but it still needs a little time to get there first.', 'the extracurricular opportunities at this school are diverse. Every student is different and are intelligent in their own way, so to keep up with the students demands and needs there are the SAD club for students that want to spread awareness or have dealt with similar issues, National honor society for students that like to take leadership and help people, LIFE program for students thats likes international affairs, foreign language club for students that likes to travel and explore , and many more.', "I have done my 3 years at this school and it hasn't been tough, as I seen in films high school was suppose to be scary and annoying. This school taught me a couple things, if you want something fight for it and show your passion, don't ever take one persons advise, and surround yourself with who you want to be. What makes this school unique is that it's small, Roosevelt is a small town, so we basically grew up together. Entering high school with people you knew since pre-k helps the settling in process and helps with less student friction, but of course at every high school there is a steaming hot head waiting to start trouble. I would choose to attend this school all over again because it helped me realize that high school is a safe and great place to be. For me I'd rather go to my school and do a little more work then be on the streets walking around or playing. Your school should be that great if you'd want to spend more hours then you have to in it.", "This school is going on a great path from where it was to where it is now is astonishing. It's up to the student to know whether they want to learn or not. You can get the worlds greatest teacher to teach a student but if they aren't dedicated then there's the issues. From my own eyes I saw a teacher that was stressed from home related issues and still had the strength to teach students that were disrespectful, disruptive, and naughty. They care and if you find one that you feel doesn't, you can see that; yes there may be a lack of dislike with the students personality but never with the work that must be put in. The teachers here never mix their feelings of a childs behavior with how they will teach them. They make everything equal and fair. At the end of the day they know that the students that put fourth the work and passion will truth succeed.", "This isn't the school i wanted to graduate from, i wanted to transfer schools but my father wouldn't let that happen. However the experience was okay.", "Only a few etcher in the school would go above and beyond to help the students. There are also a couple of teachers in the school where teaching isn't their strong suit.", 'All the clubs are run by AMAZING staff !', 'I was a member of the high school band, year book club, prom committee , and was vp of the senior class ! The parents, staff, and underclassmen were all very hands on ! We all worked united not only as a school but as a community. Every year I looked forward to our trip to visit the children and adults with  cerebral palsy. The band, football players, and cheerleaders attended every year ! There is no greater feeling than what was felt when the simple things we do could put smiles on their faces! That was by far my favorite moment in high school.', 'The teachers at Roosevelt high school pushed myself and the members of the class of 2015 to go out and do the absolute BEST we could ! They sat with us day in and out filling out college applications, scholarships, and rooted for us the entire time ! They made us want to become better students and made our High school experience unforgettable', "My feelings tours the staff at my school has always been good I had never had a problem with them I have always try to listen  to what I have to do to achieve my goals. Roosevelt High school may not be the best school However When it comes to speaking about how teacher teach I fell that their great to the point that I fell confident on doing my work right. I have been in special education since I was in 5th grade I am proud to say that special education has help me achieve many goals. I had problem's understanding most concepts but this time in my life I feel very confident to say I have achieved my goal and its been years but this last years have meant a lot for me.\r         The teachers that teach special education are very helpful they had helped me achieve my goal because their interested in making students accomplish their goals of overcoming their defects. Life as we know it is not always perfect and that is something that I have learn this years that what's sounds exciting can be field with problems what am I trying to say,I am trying to say that in 10th grade a hade a teacher that was in special education that was not so teachable and maid me feel not so excited.\r    In Addition I will be  straight forward to saying that my school is not the best district in the state but what is true is that Roosevelt high school tries its best to making students get to their dream. Teachers at Roosevelt do what they can and that is something to admire that they may be difficulties on some of them but at least most of them are wiling to do anything to take me and all the other students in my grade and In the school accomplish their interest as we come out and come in to the field we what to go."]
column6: ['The school nurse and the school health clinic abide by the rules and provide as much help as they can', 'The clubs are based on the students liking and how the students would participate in the community', 'The administrators award the students by having someone that the student is inspired by and have that person speak or present a award for their deed.', 'The teachers are the type of people that a person can go to if they need help with anything including subjects outside of classwork', 'Roosevelt High School is a great school. The only downfall is that administration and guidance counselors are very unorganized and seem not to care sometimes.', 'Roosevelt High School is on its way to building a brighter future for upcoming students. Its smart scholars program is thriving and should be promoted for all to take advantage of. This school also offers a range of sports and clubs to choose from; developing its graduates into well rounded individuals.', "I like the relationships i have with the teachers but there are a few that doesn't teach well", 'Its a great choice for a school because of its variety of students teachers and its rich curriculum for students', "Roosevelt High School is a great school. The teachers are one of most caring teachers that I've met. They do not only care about our performance in class but they also care about our well being outside the classroom and is always willing to help. This is the one thing I love about this school. Roosevelt High school is a very exciting school. There's always something going on, such as football games, volley ball games and dancing contests. One of my favorite experiences at this school was homecoming. Homecoming week is one of the best weeks at Roosevelt High School. People are so involved and up and their feet. I would definitely choose this school again because there is just something about that I know I wouldn't find in any other school.", 'Being in Roosevelt school district going on four years now , they have great potential , and they do what they can to have each kid excell in the way they personally  can , with a few words of encouragements through tout various meeting in the auditoriums . To peristalsis talks with guidance counselors . This is a great school once you know where you want to go in life , just focusing on you and what you gave to do will take you a long way , withy the help of staff', 'Over my 4 years of high school the first 2 were ridiculous my last 2 were much better but i was more than happy to leave.', "Many of the students & staff participate with the organizations & clubs. We've even been in the newspaper for previous occasions.", "I personally love the weight room in our school. It's the best & has high quality equipment.", "Overall the teachers are great & i feel they aren't given enough credit. Many teachers go oht of their way to make sure all their students succeed in whatever subject or activity.", "Homophobia is definitely an issue. Another is problem is how widely accepted underage drinking and smoking weed both are. I've never been pressured to do any of these things, but almost everyone does it. I mostly keep to myself, so that's really all I can answer from observation", "The one word I'd use to describe this school is unorganized. The whole first month of school is filled with the guidance office having to fix schedules they couldn't get right in the first place. Events take up an hour to start, and more emphasis is put on uniforms than anything else. Maybe it's my own fault for not making the best of it, but I haven't enjoyed my experience here as much as I'd have liked to. Also, it'd be nice if academic achievement was awarded as much as athletic ability", "I guess our school is fairly safe. There have been fights, but they're usually broken up pretty quickly. There are security guards everywhere, but they rarely need to be used. We're searched before entering the building, so weapons aren't a threat. Overall, there haven't been any incidents that would cause me to feel unsafe", "I don't really eat lunch, but it doesn't look appetizing at all. The pizza looks like cardboard, the meat is undercooked, and the salad smells funny. Plus, I have to pay for lunch, and there is nothing good in the vending machines. Also, there aren't any alternatives for vegans- even the salad has meat on it", "Our schools priorities are a little out of whack. Administration is more concerned with appearances than actually fixing anything. If someone is out if uniform, they will likely be sent home or suspended. Of course this same person is probably struggling in class and really shouldn't be missing it, but hey as long as we look good right? The amount of seniors in danger of not graduating is horrific. Is that their fault? Yes, but maybe if administration reached them earlier, it could've been avoided", "Football is a huge thing at my school. People from all over town come to see their games, and homecoming week is a big event. The team made it to the Long Island championship this year. Unfortunately no other sport receives as much support. Our track team does well and has a decent flowing but that's about it. Other sports, especially the girls teams, are largely ignored."]

column2: ["Very disrespectful. Don't return email. Communication poor. School needs to be honest about who they are and what they realistically can do. This will probably get deleted, since they miraculously have a perfect 5 out of 5 on their website reviews (hint: they're either not real reviews or they delete anything below 5 stars. Be cautious when someone promotes themselves as being perfect...no one is perfect!)", 'Capital Prep is an amazing school overall. We have a great community of people who grow together, who struggle together, who feel together. We all strive for the best in ourselves and try to push for the best in each other. Although there are some things we miss out on from being a small school, we always find a way to make the best of our situations. Our sense of community builds us as people and strengthens us as scholars and leaders.', 'Capital Prep is a good school for students who want to learn how to make a difference and want to go to college. Capital Prep can help you become a leader and strong advocate for change.', 'I love the capital prep because it challenges each student intellectually. The teachers there actually care about the children and work hard to ensure that each child is successful. My daughter is in the 3rd grade and attends the lower school and it has been her second year. My daughter has made great strides since being there. Now she is challenging her self to read books way past her grade level for example she tries to read Stephen king books and 6-8 grade books. What I thing could change but isn’t a huge issue is how early the children attend school because the school already runs longer the other schools and they don’t have as many days off.', 'I like some of the teachers. They could fix this system by having the teachers communicate way better with the parents', 'Overall academically I feel Capital Prepatory Harbor School has the most to offer in our City. They challenge the children to strategize and are building them up to be great problem solvers and great pillars of this community. I do feel they lack in communication from Illuminators and parents. The sports lack and the coaches leave things to the last minute for parents; which makes it difficult for parents at times.', 'Capital Prep is a place where you connect with your teachers rather than just listen to them like a machine. In some cases this can help you improve in your academics and do better than others but in many cases this start to form favoritism among the school where It almost seems like the school is making you think that some students just deserve to be better than others.', 'Capital Prep Harbor School is a school that every parent should want to send their children to.  Although this school is not for every student, the benefits of this school is amazing. Challenging students to take honors classes, college classes, fully preparing students for college, which should be the goal of all high schools.']

["I like the improvement within the school. They are now offering AP-classes and summer programs to prepare students for college. I like the help and support teachers give to their students not just for highschool but to make sure they are ready for college. One thing I don't like is the lack of arts in the school.", 'I LIKED THAT I SAW SIMILAR PEOPLE FROM WWERE IM FROM AND THEY CAME TO THIS SCHOOL FOR MOST OF THE SAME REASON I DID. THIS SCHOOL HOWEVER LACKS THE ADDITION OF CLUBS AND ACTIVITIES TO HELP US WITH THE COLLEGE PROCESS, THEY ARE TRYING TO GET THERE BUT THE STUDENTS ARE IN NEED HELP TO CHOOSE COLLEGES, SATS, EXAMS, ETC, SOME ARE SUFFERING TO PASS.', 'My Experience was wonderful what I liked most about my high school was the sisterhood and being able to count on your sister', 'I liked how they help me graduate early , and kept me on track .  I also liked the diversity . I liked the help from the guidance councilors & teachers .', 'Women’s Academy is an average school where many students attend to have a different experience than in any other school, for me it isn’t that great due to less resources and barely any activities (ap classes, art, clubs). One thing I like is that i can make some friends who are like me, and there are some who can help with some things you might not understand through the teachers. Overall it an okay school.', 'Overall, the school ought to place more extracurricular activities and courses in place. Many of the teachers, two guidance counselors and staff appear indifferent, particularly to those ambitions ones who vehemently aspires to succeed.', "It was one of the best decisions sending my daughter in this school. Not only that I don't have to worry about my daughter being influenced and worry about the boys, but this school developed not only the academic skills of my daughter but also improved her non academic aspects. This school offers leadership classes from 9th to 12th grade. It hopes to help the girls cope up with a lot of non academic issues in high school life. I am very much satisfied on how teachers informed me as a parent through a regular or weekly update of the pupil path account and sending on time text message when my daughter absent or late to class. The school also offer lunch and learn where students who are struggling come and sit down their subject teachers to get extra help. If you want to have a more personalized attention to your daughter in a public school but with private school service, I encourage you to send your daughter to WAE.", 'WAE has completely changed my life. For the mere fact that I was challenged to push myself constantly. I was always charged with excellence in my classes and kept on my toes in simple everyday interaction with faculty. I left WAE and went on to attend the prestigious Howard University in which I will be graduating with a B.S. in Political Science this upcoming May. WAE was the catalyst for me. They promote such love and care between the girls and just within ourselves. They always support you, in whatever you do. All while guiding you to the top. The faculty pours their time, Love and effort in all the women that attend this school because they all have genuine care for the ladies. They want to see us at the top of everything we involve ourselves in and when someone has such hope for you in that area and does everything they can to see it come to fruition, it changes ones life, as it did mine. I recommend the school that helped mold me into the woman that I am today.', 'I was able to graduate in 3 year and received great tutoring fro the staff members.  My experience with the students there was also great because this was not like any normal high school. Girls here actually worked together and provided feedback to one another.', 'What I liked about women academy of excellence was the sports. I liked how you could go to a teacher for help and they could assist you.', "Honestly Women's Academy of excellence is a terrible school. I f i had the choice to leave i definitely would. Not only does the school have favoritism, but they don't offer a lot things academic wise. There are always fights, some teachers i feel are unqualified but there are some that are great and try their absolute hardest. Also the school is highly unorganized, there aren't many staff so they take forever to get things done. Last but not the least the school is really dirty even the location of the school has a smell. There were bugs in the lunch room and students had to call DOE for something to be done about it. After all that there are still bugs and rats; if you want to keep your sanity find another school", 'I really enjoyed this school but I feel that the money that this school gets dose not use it properly. They still need to get their own school building', "I  am a Senior at Women's Academy of Excellence, my whole two years experience of this school has been okay, i wouldn't say the school is the best because every school have its own areas where they fall short no matter how good the school is. In Academic wise, the school is good and the teachers are excellent, the school is very diverse, there is no specific culture the school focuses on. In the area of college readiness, the have only 2 guidance counselors, and sometimes only one counselor is available which therefore puts pressure on the other counselor. The administration are very nice and helpful. Overall, the school is an okay school and i would recommend this school to anyone who would like to have an high school experience with diverse people and have teachers who would motivate you and be more than happy to recommend you to any scholarship opportunities.", "It is not the best high school to go if you're looking for a high school experience. The principal and staff are unorganized and", "Overall,this school has great staff that really care for their students and always want the best of them.The principle tries her best to have the school community as a family and as a graduate from this school I did enjoy my time in this school.The friends I made are lifetime sisters and the bonds that I made with my teachers are so strong and beautiful and this is what this school is specialize in to make a friendly and welcoming environment to their students and faculty.I loved to have been a member of the school ambassador's club it was an experience I will never forget that is what help me as a student grow and become confident and responsible in anything I do.", 'Depending on who is teaching my rating changes some teachers are always available during lunch and afterschool.Usually these teachers are the ones who teach the best because their interest is to make you as the student develop skills that can help you in the future.The teachers in the science field in this school are great ,in my opinion the best teachers in this school.Their teaching techniques are so sharp and have very satisfactory results on the students.Sadly there are only few who their goal is to help out the students exceed.But the ones who have the goal to make their students the best persons they can be are the ones who really care for them,listens to the students complaints and tries their best to fix them.These teachers are the ones who nourish the students and motivates each one to do the best and help them thought out their whole high school experience.', 'there are a percentage of Hispanic/Latino,African american/black and Muslims and i think 1 percent white.', 'Academics is basic, should be more activites and AP classes.', 'A lot of kids are from different countries and have different religions.', 'Some competition can lead to bullying in this school.']

The principal and staff are unorganized and", "Overall,this school has great staff that really care for their students and always want the best of them.The principle tries her best to have the school community as a family and as a graduate from this school I did enjoy my time in this school.The friends I made are lifetime sisters and the bonds that I made with my teachers are so strong and beautiful and this is what this school is specialize in to make a friendly and welcoming environment to their students and faculty.I loved to have been a member of the school ambassador's club it was an experience I will never forget that is what help me as a student grow and become confident and responsible in anything I do.", 'Depending on who is teaching my rating changes some teachers are always available during lunch and afterschool.Usually these teachers are the ones who teach the best because their interest is to make you as the student develop skills that can help you in the future.The teachers in the science field in this school are great ,in my opinion the best teachers in this school.Their teaching techniques are so sharp and have very satisfactory results on the students.Sadly there are only few who their goal is to help out the students exceed.But the ones who have the goal to make their students the best persons they can be are the ones who really care for them,listens to the students complaints and tries their best to fix them.These teachers are the ones who nourish the students and motivates each one to do the best and help them thought out their whole high school experience.', 'there are a percentage of Hispanic/Latino,African american/black and Muslims and i think 1 percent white.', 'Academics is basic, should be more activites and AP classes.', 'A lot of kids are from different countries and have different religions.', 'Some competition can lead to bullying in this school.']
column6: ['Not a lot of extra curricular for students in this school.', 'Theres not a lot of parents that participate in their childrens curriculums.', 'Some teachers really care about you and want you to succeed. Other teachers wouldnt care if you fail because its your fault.', 'the school is very diverse especially the Islamic religion and we all accept eachother', 'The school offers a decent amount of courses but they can offer more foreign languages other than spainish', 'most security knows the students according to name since its not a big school.', 'The school can provide more clubs and sports so that all the students in the school can be active', "The school isn't bad but if i could do it all over i would. At times i feel like the school gives the students classes they don't really need.I understand that they need a certain amount of credits but how can the kids get the credit if its all not available in summer school or pm school.The time they take for a town hall we can be in class learning.", 'In my school there are different teachers with different learning techniques.Sometimes its a bit harder to understand in certain classes such as math or chemistry.Even though some of us struggle in these areas the teachers try their best to explain the work to us as much as possible in different techniques.', 'There arent any clubs at all. There are very few activities that interest students,etc..', 'This school has its ups and downs, there is alot of drama with all the girls but if its ons thing I learned, its to steer clear of any conflicts and stick to the same small group of friends i have. I wouldnt choose this school if i had ro redo highschool consdiering the attitude of some staff which aim racist remarks, the school gets in trouble as a whole when one or a few girls do something wrong and i think that is very unfair. Also there are barley any trips and hands on activities, i think more sports should be added to this schools list.', 'There are a fee teachers who will push you that extra mile you need to go in order to graduate or simply pass a class but there are some on the other hand who would barley or not put in any effort at all when it comes to a student and her education.', 'The safety security measures are okay there is always someone that can be called to interfere if there is a fight or some other type of altercation. Sometimes the school can be dirty as there have been hairs and bugs in the cafeteria and stairwell and sometimes even the classrooms. Students rarely ever use or go to the school nurse, but from what I have heard from other students are that the nurse does not really do anything for them and just lets them rest there or go back up stairs.', 'There are not as many extracurriculars as I would like. Some of the activities are not that enjoyable as other schools. Most of the students who participate in clubs or sports are the honor or athletes in the school. There are not that many things that many clubs or sports that students take interest in.', 'Throughout, my four years at this school I have liked how I made friends that support me in my studies, and how some of the teachers have took their time to get to know me and helped me get my grades to where I wanted them to be.', 'Teachers try their best, but sometimes they need to be more involved with the students. They also need to keep asking more if the students need help, so that the students can truly understand what they are learning.', 'the school is uhhh lets just say safe because we now have alarmed doors but what kinda makes the school unsafe is that WAE share the same building with three other schools.', 'the teachers are great, they always there to help', 'the teachers are great and they help the students when they in need of more elaboration on the topic being taught in class, the teachers sometimes skip their lunch time just to help students. overall, the teachers are the best!', 'i am a junior at WAE and so far the school is doing great, the level of discipline is high, the students are more engaged in their school work and the school is more fun. WAE is a great school to meet and know about people from different cultures and countries. its a great school!']

column1: High School for Health Careers & Sciences
column2: ['I love it , it is very diverse . I meet a lot of different people , so many activities and after school program you can join. We just now getting out of school at 2:30 it was at 3:41 pm and that was late . It’s so many programs that can help you with college ( what you need to do before going to college).', "when i first started high school there,i was really nervous about it because i had no connections i didn't really know anybody.little by little the staff and students at my school make it felt like i was at home.they help me develop a lot of skills that i didn't know i had", "My overall experience at the High School for Health Careers and Sciences will be remembered as lessons learned. I have had teachers who were dedicated and teachers who weren't. I have made and lost friends. I have learn how to work hard and know how to solve different problems by appling different strategies.  Honestly the students that attend the school do not strive to be the best they can be . Yes, there are teachers who constantly try to push us to be great and to do better but some students are appreciated of that help. I would say what makes the school a good school is the programs it has. I can say because of the programs students are engage but with school work they are slightly uninterested. Tutoring is offered after school and on Saturdays for students who need extra help academically with their school work.  The school has some glows and grows but still needs to improve to help students become the best they can be.", "It's a okay school. I came here because I was new last year eighth grade  when I came to America. I am a current freshmen and am thinking of changing my high school.  If you are an A and B student you might want to consider some place else.", 'This school is a small school where you get to know everyone, and everyone is like family. However, this school is not for everyone because you can be really distracted.', 'The teacher and staff are very supportive and if you put in the effort they will try there best to make you pass and always have additional help if needed great school glad I graduated here', 'The school is great! Safety is really good here. They give a lot of college readiness for seniors at all times. Saturdays are also days for tutoring. The principal is involved in everything and cares a lot about our concerns. There is a diversity of teachers also that very much care about your grades. Clubs are a very good list to choose from here also, a little bit of everything. Just like sports will get you even more involved in school because for you to get in you have to have good grades.', "The extracurricular opportunities at this school are okay. There aren't many opportunities but many students do participate in the ones that are available.", 'The school is very underfunded but they make it work.', 'They are not the best of teachers but they do try their hardest to make sure that we all succeed.', "Every morning students have to swipe their student ID's and go through scanning. My school has a clinic from what i have heard is very helpful especially to the pregnant students. But i have not yet seen any health programs or resources even though my school is specifically for health careers & sciences.", 'I think the school is very helpful when it comes to college prep. I am currently taking a college prep class which i think is really helpful. The sports teams are very excellent, specifically baseball and softball.', "My overall experience at this school is not great. The attendance rate is very low. There are physical fights between students nearly almost every day and i am not exaggerating at all. Most of the students at this school can care less about the school or of their work. Some of the students are very disrespectful towards not only their peers but the teachers as well. The setting of the school is disgusting - the school is filled with garbage and various odors. I wouldn't choose this school because not only the students are careless but the teachers are as well, and i can argue that the teachers do not challenge us enough to be better students.", "I honestly believe that the teachers at my school do not challenge the students hard enough. What i mean is that the teachers give us work where the answers are right in front of us so its easy to pass the class, and if you don't pass the class it's because you're a careless student who doesn't do their work. Overall the teachers are very friendly with the students and they're easy to approach and comforting to talk too. If you're not doing your work the teachers care less because there is nothing they can do about it which is probably one reason why the graduation rate at my school is so low. I see no difference in the teaching styles between all teachers, i think they all teach in the same style which tends to get boring and us students use the same techniques for almost every class subject.", "There is not much to do after school except for tutoring.  The clubs and after school activities have practically vanished.  There is no incentive to stay engaged in this school because students aren't rewarded for their efforts.", 'The school tried their best but being a NYC high school had its limitations. Teachers were required to teach to the regents, there was very little initiatives and very poor parent involvement.  There was a tremendous drop out rate.', 'Some teachers do go above and beyond but some do not care about their teaching.  Their lessons are boring and do not put anything into the lesson but the bare minimum.', 'What made the school unique for me was the friends I had and the nice teachers who pushed me to strive for more and when I had a slip up I had someone to talk to.', "The interest of teachers at HSHCS is to help all students excel through the lesson , every teacher has a different teaching skill but HSHCS try to have multiple teacher just in case you cant work with one you can move to another teacher if its  possible. Most of the teachers communicate well with the students but you have your 1 or 2 who just get to frustrated and become rude if the students doesn't understand as soon as possible, also there is  a language barrier between the teachers at are not Hispanic in a school where the majority are Hispanic.", 'Those 4 years at that high school where the best.']
