column2: ['It offers a great amount of programs for everyone to fit their liking. They also offer college classes at the start of 9th grade.', 'Overall, Hero High School is an okay school. The great things about the school is that they offer great internships and programs that focuses on nursing. The school’s main focus is Health so anyone who is considering health should attend the school. They offer early college courses as well. They also have a 2 year nursing program and after completion, you’ll receive your associate degree. The things that aren’t so good about the school is the environment. It is somewhat dull. Many will say that they may not feel comfortable in the school, specifically with the other pupils. The school does not offer a large variety of clubs and after school sports. The school is very encouraging and the staff are respectful and responsible.', 'From beginning to end they push 1 college, the one their associated with. There is no inclusion to all the opportunities out there.', "this school  is upcoming school therefore their is a lot of many issues that have yet to fully addressed. It is more willing to spend time more with students who don't do no good for the school community rather then kids who are willing to learn which is wrong and unfair.", 'I love the college readiness and how involved the teachers are. I also like how we take trips to hospitals to see what go on in the hospitals and to Prepare us for future jobs in the hospitals and also other thing I love is the internships but I feel like the school can the a little bit better with the clubs, activities and sports.', 'This high school opened in the year of 2013 and I can truly say it has improved very well. The staff and the opportunities it offers are very helpful and useful!', 'It could’ve been better. The way they handle students problems are kind of dumb. Some of the teachers there don’t even teach well and most students don’t learn at all because of them. When it comes to clubs and activities after school, most students don’t participate in them and just go home which is the reason why there are barely any clubs in the school.', "When I first attended this school as a freshman the school had only been open for 2 years. So overall this school is still pretty new. I will be apart of the second graduating class(2018). This school is offering an amazing opportunity for the student who want to pursue a career in the health field. To be honest it was overwhelming but the work pays off. My experience was good but it could of been better but as the school grow and change I'm sure you can have the best experience ever.", 'I like that hero high has time for the students if something is wrong with a student they will notice and help very fast but sometimes since it\'s a lot of kids Im the high school they tend to forget and delay them but they do a great job as a "new school"', 'The school can be very unorganized but they do offer a great amount of resources, such as college classes at the start of your sophomore year.', 'H.e.r.o High school is a great school for kids who want to go into the medical field they train us to be the best nurses or doctors.', "Ever since my first day at this school, I absolutly loved it. I felt like it was somewhere that I belonged. The school has a feeling of a little community. The teachers are very caring and the principal makes sure that she know every child's name. You won't be forgotten there.", "At HERO high school, from the moment you enter you feel a welcoming vibe from the principal ,especially from the teachers. The teachers are very understanding and work with you through every step in every course. Whether you're solving difficult equations in geometry to naming body parts in Anatomy, they are very helpful. I proudly recommend this school to any junior high school graduate and students that are interested in transferring schools.", 'The teachers at hero high school tend to work hard and help the students do great in their academics. We also got the opportunity to take many college classes.']

column1: World Academy for Total Community Health
column2: ['I enjoyed my years there. It has it’s challenges but the teachers there are great once you get to know them and you’ve formed a bond with them.', '- school is Alrite . Doesn’t have much clubs , kinda sucks for us kids . Ms Chrissy the principal is terrible she doesn’t allow anything fun really messes up the school', 'This school allowed me to take college classes and have college center downstairs to help me prepare for college as well.', 'While I was a student in WATCH HS, I was able to develop my character. Since the school is not very competitive, one can easily thrive, tho it depends on each year class. I still have a special place in my heart for the teachers that helped me adapt to the new culture, and constantly believed in me.', 'Not the best school. You will grow to like it because of the community, but the academics are subpar compared to a middle range NYC public high school.It is, however, getting better.', "World Academy for Total Community Health is a good school lots of diversity and friendly people. The teachers are helpful and show interest in you and whether you understand the concept or not. One thing that could be changed is the activities, there aren't a lot of them.", "I like the diversity in this school. Everyone feels welcome. I participated in sports throughout my senior year. I joined the volleyball team and the Flag football team. There are also many interesting clubs such as Student Gov. Photography Club, a CTE program , Chorus, and many others. Beacuse it's a small school,Teachers are very engaged with the students. Everyone have the possibility to learn, staff members are also encouraging you for College Readiness. It was a fun and life changing experiment.", 'My school has al lot of opportunities for students to get involved. Some clubs are the dance team, basketball, football, and track. The best sports at my school is the boys basketball team and the track team. My school is more known for its sports.', 'My overall experience at this school was very extreme. My favorite experience in this school was my change of maturity. I had too many distractons when I first entered this school although it never stopped me from working hard. My school is unique because its small and we all come together like a family. If I could start high school all over I would choose this school again because of its size and the wonderful staff members however I would make better decisions.', 'The teachers in my school are very dependable. Their style of teaching is very good, we follow the same routine daily. The teachers are always available for the students, even on their lunch breaks and after school. I feel we receive the grade we work for, and there is always a chance to get extra credit. Teachers in my school show that they really enjoy teaching us and not just work to work.', 'There is a moderate health safety system at the school. However, it is constantly increasing', 'There are many clubs and extracurricular activities, whether during or after school. Generally the are all very productive and interesting.', 'The school overall is really great. It is easy to learn and succeed at this school', 'The teachers are patient, hardworking , gentle , precise and they talk time out as available to help individuals as necessary.', 'W.A.T.C.H  is a pretty good school however they lack in certain places. They offer students college levels courses which is great to get experience but they are not free. They have holiday plays which is fun for the students to get involved in but not everybody can participate. They do not give early ending schedules to students even if you have completed your requirements.', 'My school is going through a building process at the moment due to a recent principle change.  There are only a couple of teachers who motivate the student to do their best and are actually concern about whether or not students make it pass high school.', 'The school i attend is populated with a averaged amount of students from same race.  ', 'There are many extracurricular activities at the school i attend. Some example are Bccp club,theater club,music club,robotics club and others. The most popular club is the Bccp which stands for Brooklyn Community College  partnership club.', 'somethings that make my school a great school is the programs that they offers.Everyone at school is very friendly. The thing that make the school I attend unique is the Certified Nursing Program that is offer. I would consider attending this school if i could do it all over because of the CNA programa and all the other programs there.', 'The security guards any my school take their serious.They are very friendly. Student that are in the nursing  wear blue scrubs. Ours guidance counselors are very involve in getting students for college.  ']

column2: ["My experience at Opportunity Charter School was great. I've made friends very quickly and the staff were very welcoming. The teachers helped me if I needed it in classroom if I don't understand the assignment. The School overall is a great place for a student to come to receive a great education.", "My experience at Opportunity charter school was amazing. The average class size, eight to fifteen kids which was a good size for me to learn. Always had help when needed, my school had afterschool  programs to help us. Not only academically also social afterschool programs. Which was good for kids who didn't want to go straight home afterschool. But at the same time keeping them safe and not in the streets. At school I felt very comfortable and safe.", 'I would like for there to be more clubs and sports and more ways to get involved with the community and also more ways to get jobs. But the school is very helpful with college reddiness', 'The opportunity Charter school in Harlem, New York most certainly has opportunities for minorities. During my times there, I was able receive several opportunities including scholarships and programs that helped me settle into College very smoothly. However, things I would like to see change are the academic aspects of the school. There needs to be better teachers who can teach and show students that education is really important. Who can also inspire and make these kids comfortable enough to want to learn and think about their future.', "The academics offered at this school is good. There are many different curriculum's and the amount of work I get is manageable, all you have to do is make time to do the work and put effort into the work.", 'I am in World Culture Club and what we do is learn about different cultures an there religions, food, music, and traditions. World culture club gives me an opportunity to learn about other cultures besides my own.', "My overall experience at opportunity charter school has been a roller-coaster. I have been in this school for 5 years going on 6. I have created a bond with my music teacher with a small passion for playing piano and he taught me how to play. My favorite experience was picking songs I liked and showing him so he could teach me hoe to play them on the piano whenever I was the only one in his class. This school is unique because everyone I have ever meet in that school either taught me something or we've created a mutual friendship with one another.", 'The teachers at my school are easy-going and some push you to try harder. The teachers in my grade right now are giving new knowledge I never even thought about  before and my teachers answer any questions I may have for them to help me better understand something I did not understand before.', "The staff of OCS, is always looking inside of classrooms, bathrooms,staircases, and even outside of the school to see if there's anything wrong. Ocs staff is always looking out for their and our health and safety one hundred percent.", 'Opportunity charter school has Chess,Book, Anime, Culinary arts, video games, arts and crafts,student government, photography  and advisory clubs for us so can ease our minds and have fun as we learn. Also the after school activities, gives students a chance to do homework and get tutoring from teachers. The athletic sports that we do after school brings us as a family rather than friends. Throughout the school year, Children Aid Society will give us internships and jobs so we can get glimpse of experience of the real world and how to get ready for it.', "Unlike other schools, Opportunity Charter School gave me a chance to feel great, as I was in elementary school i really didn't get one on one attention like the staff in Ocs. Ocs staff makes me feel like I'm in a family that supports me every time I step through those doors", "Teachers in Opportunity Charter School, is there for students 7 days out of the week. If you're failing they will find  a way to get your grade up, if you're struggling they will sit with you until you get the subject/lesson right. They also give students great tips to succeed in life", 'This school offers a safe and well-built environment. There are a lack of incidents or major health and/or safety issues. I have barely encountered danger since attending this school in 2010.', 'At Opportunity Charter School, students are committed to being part of clubs and different after-school activities. Their commitment reflects their great academic performances in their classes.', 'What makes this school unique is that the staff and teachers are very committed to helping students get to great places in life and they help them get prepared for what awaits them in the outside world.', 'At Opportunity Charter School, you can bond with the teachers and they will truly help you achieve success in and out of school.', 'Everyone is friendly. There is no such thing of someone beating the life out of you when you walk through the entrance doors. Security is good and very friendly. The school nurse is good as well as the students. Even though the students are rowdy, everyone is very cool.', 'No one has a problem with extracurricular activities in this school because the students choose the club that they want to be in rather then be put in by force.', "Most of these parents that have children going to this school, aren't kidding with their children's education which is a good thing since they are the one's that want the best education for their children whether its middle or high school. And there are many parents that do get involved in school activities whether its fundraising or supporting the sports teams.", 'There are teachers that are fun and love the lessons they engage with their students and there are teachers that aren\'t considered "students favorite".']

column6: ['The Opportunity Charter School is a good academic environment to get an education.', 'There is no weight room for students athletes in all sports.', 'There is always someone you can go to if you in some type of trouble .', "Since there is not enough space we don't get a lot of challenging classes such as AP courses. But the classes we do have is enough to obtain credit to graduate. Fortunately my school does offer online classes to student that are missing credits or want to take more.", 'My school extremely anti-Bully. Even if its outside of school , they will still take care of it.', 'There is not enough space in the building , which limits the amount of space we have to try new sports.', 'You get classes with a least everyone in your grade level.', "There isn't enough space for extra clubs and activities", 'Its is very easy to build a relationship with them.', 'My school needs more food options but the food they serves is great.', 'There is no bullying at all in this school. The guidance counselors are always there to support you anytime. The principal is really nice too and also is involve with student activates.', 'We have student government, senior meeting, cheerleadering meetings', 'Students really love coming to gym and have fun. Most students love coming out to the basketball and volleyball games. We would have a staff vs students playoff and that is awesome to see that teachers and students can have fun together', 'Somebody please come to the school and make a chance', 'This school needs somebody to make it a recognizable or something because this school has nothing man no spirit what so ever', "I HATE THIS SCHOOL ??????-_- with all my heart and soul !!! But there's days where I like it, and then 2 minutes later it reminds of why I hate it ??-_-", 'Works well with students teachers know all students names .', 'Lots of students practice many things like yoga.', 'The academics offered are generally for high school students who are eligible to take the classes and most of the classes are just meant to prepare students for college. There are not enough general classes  challenging the students academically.', "The food was said tho  have given many students an illness and have up set stomachs after eating them. The smell isn't approachable and most students prefer to eat out instead of eating the food the school supplies."]

column1: The Barack Obama Green Charter High School
column2: ["I've grown so much being a student at The Barack Obama Green Charter High School. The small classes have worked so well for me academically because I got more one on one time with my teachers.  As far as sports, the school doesn't offer any, however they do offer a variety of other clubs that build leadership skills. I have been apart of clubs such as Peer Leadership and Junior Achievement which have helped me build my leadership and public speaking skills. Overall, The Barack Obama Green Charter High School is  an amazing school for students who are interested in becoming Global Citizens and sustainable adults.", "This school is too small to function! The food is terrible, I didn't have a Math teacher for almost a whole year. Some of the teachers here don't even know what they're doing.", 'BOGCHS lacks to prepare students for the real world. The school is full of favoritism and the students do not receive Home EC classes.', "I've been at BOGCHS since freshman year and it has not been a memorable experience for me. The staff are unprofessional and are ALWAYS in student drama. The staff curse at the students and show them zero respect. Educational wise the teaching is okay. New teachers are needed because I personally feel like I haven't learned anything valuable these past 3 years.", "At BOGCHS, I can honestly say that theres NO learning happening. We just do work to pass. I don’t agree with the favoritism, and robbery. We’ve been giving this school our money for years yet theres no changes to the food? The building? By favoritism for example, the school says that they don't allow slippers and APPARENTLY not ripped jeans. I come to school with ripped jeans that I’ve been wearing since the BEGINNING of the year and they want to come after me when the school year is ending, but there’s some with ripped jeans as well, skirts, shorts, see through clothes, short dresses, etc! The security lady won’t tell them a thing since she’s close to them. We have to pay 1 dollar every Friday to wear regular clothes yet we can’t wear what we choose.", "Attending Barack Obama Green Charter HIghschool helped me realize that it's important to look after yourself because no one else will. You are in charge of encouraging yourself, rewarding yourself, and taking care of your mind and body. The work is hard, but this school is setting their young scholars for success and preparing them for real life. However, I do feel as if this school could have given the young the students a class where they learn how to do real-world activities. For example, home economics would be a perfect fit, even though it's a tight budget. If it were up to me, we should have classes where we learn how to buy a car or a house, and maybe learn to cook for the kids who may not know how to. I do applaud them for having personal finance / applied economics because, after having it for two years, I personally learned a lot. The school is small, but it's very welcoming and accepting of each student and staff member.", 'So far this school has given me a very grear experience. The school which is good making it easier to find my classes. All teachers and students know each other, making a very good one on one interation.', 'My high school has a student to teacher ratio of 15:1.  That is exceptional! Every student gets the attention they need and deserve. The curriculum given is a vigorous one that will prepare us for our adult lives.  We are a green school so what we have learned will contribute to our  earth for years to come.  The safety of our school is also a plus.  Feeling safe while attending classes is very important in this day and age. Overall, I give this high school a thumbs up!', 'So far my experiences at my school has been great. Although the school is small, you familiarize many faces and soon become like family. What  I like about the school is how mostly everyone knows everyone and how friendly the staff and students can be. My experience was great and will end great.', 'The Barack Obama Green Charter Highschool is an opportunity for kids applying to high school to take in Plainfield. Its unique in its attitude and atmosphere. It may be small but, it will have you ready for college and impacted by its diverse surroundings and good education. Their teachers vary from helpful, wise eductors to poorly qualifed right out of college instructors. However, this school helps students figure out who they really are and prepares them for the challenges ahead. Students will automatically form a bond with BOGCHS through their staff and experiences.', 'Barack Obama Green Charter High School as a whole is a building block that helps you discover who you are and who you want to be. From the many academic opportunities, to the community in which we work and learn; patience is never in short supply. All of the staff push us to be our best selves because all they want to see is us living our best lives with confidence. BOGCHS will always be part of me wherever I go, not because I attend there for college, but because they are my family.', 'This is my third year at Barack Obama Green Charter High School and it has been a good experience. From Freshman year to now, it has changed a lot and there are excellent teachers here. The teachers care a lot about students education and their success in the future. There is always room for change and we could have better security precautions. Also, i feel like some teachers are not fit to teach in this school. But, other than that this school is a good choice to send your child. It is a college preparatory high school and we will have your child in the best fit for their dream school.  This is a school with about 200 children so of course we do not have room for a gym or auditorium and we do not have much after school activities but there is a few that students would enjoy like bowling, green team, student council, etc.', 'If you just do the necessary things that you need to do in this high school in order to succeed in life, you will go places.', "This is a no cost Charter school.  The teachers are warm, caring and knowledgeable people.  My only concerns are the teachers  don't remain for very long.", "My experience at Barack Obama Green Charter High School was full of many ups and downs. I've ran through many challenges but overall I have overcame them and highly succeeded. Everyone in the school is very open hand welcoming and wants to see all of their kids succeed but it's with the amount of time that you put into the work yourself. If you need help there are multiple teachers who are open to help and make sure you have a clear understanding of any problem that you may face but there are consequences to bad behavior. If I could change anything about the school I would make it more into a school pride environment with many more opportunities to the students.", 'The Barack  Obama green charter high school is a great school they have show us that they do care for are education and they spend a lot of time show us new things. This school is very great and it has good teacher and their system is great.', "In my school we rarely have any health issues but if there is one we have a nurse that does the best she can do. Although must of our students wish the nurse can provide medicine such as Advil, cough drops, etc our school isn't bad i just wish she provide more medicine for us instead of us having to go home every time we have cramps or headache or offering heating pads that necessarily  dont work.", "Although we don't have as many opportunity as most high schools we try are best to get as many activities for are children to feel as though they go to a regular high school by trying to provide sports like the public highs and clubs such as cooking, basketball, video game, year book, gardening, soccer club, etc. Our school also provides advisory clubs were they get to act with a teacher and get to know more for personally use and also so the advisor can help you with anything you help with whether its in or outside of school", "At my school many parents are very supportive towards the children in the school. Most parents help the children  with fundraising such as fashion shows, school parties, bake sales, our basketball team. All of our parents have a big support in the kids life because without our parents  we wouldn't have the moral support that they give us. Our parents bring the best out of our children because of the support the give us.", "In my last 3 years of high school i have had many teachers who helped me succeed throughout my high school years so far. I've had teaches who actually took the time out to get to know me as an individual that i am to understand the teaching skills i understand the most. There also teachers that i look at to as my older brother or sisters, aunts and uncles while i was at school. I actually had teachers who actually cared about bout me and my education and wanted me to be somebody."]

column2: ['My experience in school is not so bad because i was able to learn new things because of my teacher who are really helpful. also my teachers care about my improvement more than anyone. i am really greatful to my teachers who are working so hard for me to have batter future.', 'Through all of my accomplishments and disappointments, I have always been especially proud of the dedication and fervor I possess for my personal beliefs and values.', "My experience in this High SchooI had been very good. I've adquired a variety of new knowledge. Teachers know how to treat you and make you feel comfortable. I think they need to improve the guidance to college for Seniors students. But, overall,I consider this school is very good.", "I have been studied this school last 4 years. It is good for new comer students. It has more than 70 percents students are Spanish. At the beginning when I was there that time it was a good quality school. But later on its become worst school. Dr. Namnun is the principle of this school who hired lot of teachers that wasn't helpful for student. I have seen lot of students left this school. Even some teachers complain about other teacher. But there was a math teacher named by Dr. Puang Lu who was very skilled teacher. He helped lot of students. And also community wasn't that  much bad.", "I had many experiences in this school. The teachers are great and do care about you. As long as you do what they expect you to do and be respectful towards them, you could get to make strong bonds with them. The school lives up to its name as their student body is composed of people from many countries. Many subjects are well taught except for Mathematics which most of the time leads students to being unprepared for their Regents and challenging classes like Pre-Calculus. In the last two years I've been in this school, I saw students being assigned to the wrong classes as they were not prepared for them like a junior taking Government class when they haven't even taken U.S. History. Some staff members have been very rude; these people expect the student to respect them but they won't do that in exchange. Aside from that, I met a lot of people and great teachers who have inspired me to make a change. I still believe the school would do better if they were up to it.", 'World Cultures lives to its name. There\'s a very strong sense of diversity and acceptance. Teachers make sure students learn the cultural differences that exist and how respect is necessary to live in an inclusive society. Hispanic students are a very big number in the school, then Africans, Asians, and some people from Europe. There haven been events like "Mix it Up Day" where students who usually sit at a specific place would go to other tables and meet new people. I\'ve had the opportunity to meet some students who were confident enough to talk about their sexual orientation. And, even though some students have different views on some people\'s sexual orientation, teachers would be there to open up a little more those minds.', 'Scheduling process is in between; students are assigned what they need but these schedules are very likely to change. In September and October 2015, there were too many changes and everything was messy. Some students could not even have a stable schedule and they were bound to move all the time. Adding to that, some sophomores and juniors had to deal with US History when they had not even taken Global before.', 'Annoying at times but security is great.', 'Many of the students that take after class improve.', "It's a great school, specially for bilinguals.", 'Teachers at WC are devoted to their duty.', 'I think is neither great but also not that bad', 'the students are very diverse even most of the students come from Dominican republic, there are students from countries in Africa, Bengal Latin america and some others.', "the administration in the school is disorganized, they said something and then do not accomplish it. they are very strict  with the dress code but they don't solve it, some of the students still going with regular cloths.", 'the teachers at WC are the best, they are always to help and teach you English.', 'there are many activities for the students and also extra help for the students. There is cooking, photography and computer activities for the students and also they have pm school for any subject you need help with.', 'the couches are good, they motivate the team to do better every time and tell them to have a very good fitness. In addition the competition and friendship that is created among the students is pretty good.', "The teachers are very good and they are always there for the students and motivated them to learn. However the administration and staff are disorganized and don't keep a right track to the teachers and students.", 'This school has been great for me. I came in the US as an immigrant and started from ninth grade (high school). They taught me English and the teachers there if you care and try hard, they are the best and will help you graduate and go to college. We had even avid classes in the past few school years. They did not have AP classes but now they do. This school helps immigrants learn English, pass their classes and regents exams and help them into going to colleges. I thank them for that. It might be the best high school compared to others but it is for me.', 'They give a variety of classes, and a of of options. There are now AP classes ( Three of them). We have also honor classes like Pre-Calculus and Physics. Everyone knows the grading policy and have a planner. For some students like me the workload is a lot because I am a senior and the level of the classes like AP and honor but also because of college stuff that I have to do. So, managing all that plus the after school programs that I have and being part of the government is extremely a lot, but I hope that 2014 will be a better semester.']
column4: ['My experience in school is not so bad because i was able to learn new things because of my teacher who are really helpful. also my teachers care about my improvement more than anyone. i am really greatful to my teachers who are working so hard for me to have batter future.', 'Through all of my accomplishments and disappointments, I have always been especially proud of the dedication and fervor I possess for my personal beliefs and values.', "My experience in this High SchooI had been very good. I've adquired a variety of new knowledge. Teachers know how to treat you and make you feel comfortable. I think they need to improve the guidance to college for Seniors students. But, overall,I consider this school is very good.", "I have been studied this school last 4 years. It is good for new comer students. It has more than 70 percents students are Spanish. At the beginning when I was there that time it was a good quality school. But later on its become worst school. Dr. Namnun is the principle of this school who hired lot of teachers that wasn't helpful for student. I have seen lot of students left this school. Even some teachers complain about other teacher. But there was a math teacher named by Dr. Puang Lu who was very skilled teacher. He helped lot of students. And also community wasn't that  much bad.", "I had many experiences in this school. The teachers are great and do care about you. As long as you do what they expect you to do and be respectful towards them, you could get to make strong bonds with them. The school lives up to its name as their student body is composed of people from many countries. Many subjects are well taught except for Mathematics which most of the time leads students to being unprepared for their Regents and challenging classes like Pre-Calculus. In the last two years I've been in this school, I saw students being assigned to the wrong classes as they were not prepared for them like a junior taking Government class when they haven't even taken U.S. History. Some staff members have been very rude; these people expect the student to respect them but they won't do that in exchange. Aside from that, I met a lot of people and great teachers who have inspired me to make a change. I still believe the school would do better if they were up to it.", 'World Cultures lives to its name. There\'s a very strong sense of diversity and acceptance. Teachers make sure students learn the cultural differences that exist and how respect is necessary to live in an inclusive society. Hispanic students are a very big number in the school, then Africans, Asians, and some people from Europe. There haven been events like "Mix it Up Day" where students who usually sit at a specific place would go to other tables and meet new people. I\'ve had the opportunity to meet some students who were confident enough to talk about their sexual orientation. And, even though some students have different views on some people\'s sexual orientation, teachers would be there to open up a little more those minds.', 'Scheduling process is in between; students are assigned what they need but these schedules are very likely to change. There is cooking, photography and computer activities for the students and also they have pm school for any subject you need help with.', 'the couches are good, they motivate the team to do better every time and tell them to have a very good fitness. In addition the competition and friendship that is created among the students is pretty good.', "The teachers are very good and they are always there for the students and motivated them to learn. However the administration and staff are disorganized and don't keep a right track to the teachers and students.", 'This school has been great for me. I came in the US as an immigrant and started from ninth grade (high school). They taught me English and the teachers there if you care and try hard, they are the best and will help you graduate and go to college. We had even avid classes in the past few school years. They did not have AP classes but now they do. This school helps immigrants learn English, pass their classes and regents exams and help them into going to colleges. I thank them for that. It might be the best high school compared to others but it is for me.', 'They give a variety of classes, and a of of options. There are now AP classes ( Three of them). We have also honor classes like Pre-Calculus and Physics. Everyone knows the grading policy and have a planner. For some students like me the workload is a lot because I am a senior and the level of the classes like AP and honor but also because of college stuff that I have to do. So, managing all that plus the after school programs that I have and being part of the government is extremely a lot, but I hope that 2014 will be a better semester.']

column1: West Bronx Academy for the Future
column2: ['I’ve been in West Bronx for the past 4 years, and they have been the best. Not only have a made so many friends from the many clubs and extracurricular activities my school has, but it has made it a fun experience. Everyone at West Bronx are culturally United with school Spirit. It always feels like you are at home while getting an education from the most determined teachers. Always bringing in the most positive energy into the classrooms. Making the student feel engage and ready to learn. West Bronx has come a long way, and If I could change something it would be, to provide more rigorous courses that challenge the student. Im in senior year and I would love the ability to take more AP classes but unfortunately I can’t because of the lack of teachers not being able to teach those courses.', 'I have thrived under the direction of teachers who have taught at this school. However, students makes it hard to stay focus and remain on track. The students at this school took away my confident to set a solid foundation for a good learning path. Most of the kids did not developed a true love for learning. The school offers art and music, but there’s not many clubs to keep students more engaged in. I wouldn’t recommend coming to this school for high-school because it drains the life and energy out of you.', 'The school is located in the Bronx. The teachers care about their students and challenge the students to do more than their best. They reward the students to try and get them to continue their hard work. They have College Now programs and many AP courses that have helped me get to where I am today. I graduated from this school in 2016, and I still have teachers that email me just to chat. The staff in this school are the best. I love them so much, the people at West Bronx Academy for the Future were and still are my family.', 'This school is horrible. I wouldn’t recommend it at all. There are some teachers that are good, and actually care about their students shout-out to ms.green and ms.ortiz. This school has fights weekly rather it’s at lunch or in between classes. Some teachers force polotics onto your child such as mr.casson. I feel like I’m not ready to take any tests because most teachers don’t make sure their student understands what they’re learning and blame it on the fact they can’t control a class. The students here are mostly Hispanic. I’ve experienced a LOT of bullying while in this school. And wouldn’t even consider staying here for highschool.', "I loved it. I've been there since 6th grade so I basically grew up with the school. The staff and teachers are really kind and love what they are doing. I like that my school does so much activity and really bring the grades together when doing spirit week.", 'Has great teacher that will always help you in anything that you might need. There are many afterschool activities and programs that all student can join. You are also able to get a  job opportunity to have some experience .', "Haveing been in the school since 6th grade, I've always seen myself as one of the most excelled students, aside with 2 or 3 other peers. Attending my school has always seemed like a struggle. With the lack of teachers cooperation to move forward with a lesson or with their uncompetitiveness to properly control a classroom setting, I have always felt as if I was not getting any learning done. On the flip side, with a varities of sports and clubs that my school offered, I have always found my self doing one thing or the other. Joing the schools varsity swim team has prepared me to become the young athelitc leader that I am today. Competing in City Wide events, with only minumjm amount of training, I have found myself in 6th place on the 200 yard freestyle competion. ", "They've always been on top of things when it comes to the safety of the students.", "There isn't much to do or much to get involved in but there are things. You really have to ask and search and be extremely persistent when wanting something.", "I worked in the school office. There's not  as many parents involved as there should be but a lot of them support their own child in some way or another", 'Many teachers encourage students to share their ideas and opinions on how to make certain topics more interesting. They give us the opportunity to develop our creativity and learn through teaching materials inside and outside the classroom. While others are very old fashion and stick to one method of teaching.', "The teacher in this school are peppy and fun. They make learning fun plus, they are always trying to relate to us. The majority of these teachers truly care and will go out of their way to make sure that the students are happy and safe. The are teachers that do after-school tutoring even though they aren't being payed for it. The teachers treat us like their children. In all of the years that I have attended this school I have felt like I was apart of a huge family because of these teachers.", 'This school has been pretty okay due to the academics but despite the kids are found of fighting and dealt with drugs, hope more room for improvement', 'The way things are ran can be better', 'The fitness programs are okay  and useful at times', 'The extra curricular activities could be better', 'The health conditions are good,such as the nurse.', "The dress code is boring many people don't wear it", 'We are accept friends with different backgrouds', 'I would never choose this school again']

column2: ['It was a new experience, when I entered I knew that this was the right school for me and I loved all 4 years of it.', "I enjoy telling others what school I go to and them congratulating me because of such a good it was, however, it's not like that anymore. I can't really get work done because of all the distractions in the classroom like kids arguing with each other or the teachers. On the upside, I like the environment of when I first arrive at school, the principal is always outside greeting the students.", "University High School was overall terrible. The majority of the teachers didn't teach, give assignments or help me learn anything overall. The school is very nasty; there were always cockroaches and rats in the cafeteria and locker room. Some of the teachers care but majority teachers acted like they didn't have the degree.", 'Entering high was a huge change from elementary school. At first I was not used to the huge hallways, students bigger than me, the teachers not as friendly, because everything was more serious and efficient than elementary school. Along the way I was accustomed to the new environment and I made lots of friend, much of the staff helped me with many resources to continue my education at a University, I was involved in the school clubs, athletics, even earned well enough graded to be inducted into the National Honors Society of High School Students, which seemed to feel like the most accomplishing event in my high school career. Overall, i enjoyed my time at University High School, I would not have wanted my college preparations to be given any differently. yeah', 'What I like about university high school is the student teacher relationships with some students and teachers. I would like the food to taste and be better and the cleanliness of the school needs to improve.', "I went there for four years. It was a solid school but compared to schools like science park a school in the area, it lacked alot. Certain teachers are truly great but after the year of 2018 the school will most likely be in need of rebuild. Sports are solid but the main focus of the school is basketball other sports take backseat. School consist predominantly of African Americans. The class rooms need to be fixed and given proper materials, the school barely has computers and it's 2018.", "The school isn't clean, not good lunches. There's tons of roaches and ants. Some teachers can't teach in the right way. It used to be a magnet school but now it's horrible. The security check is horrible, a student even brought a gun one time. The area around the school isn't clean, tons of students smoking after school. Too much fights.", 'University High School sets high goals for all the students that attend here, in University there’s always a helping hand for you every need. The teachers will always assist you when you whenever you need the help. The staff are fair and polite. The students at University can always be trusted to come together and get a job done no matter them situations some students have with each other. It’s high school, of course there is going to be some type of drama, but the students always go to a responsible adult about their situations and don’t let it effect them and their grades in anyway. You can. expect many opportunities and fun experiences attending University High School in Newark, NJ.', 'What i liked about my school is the fact that it was discipline and the awesome teachers who worked with the students who were struggling with their courses and most importantly everyone helping each other out like a family because there’s a saying that it takes a village to raise a child.', 'I had an awesome experience at this school. I wish we can change the teacher and get teachers that actually teach. Overall this is a good school for sports but academics wise it’s too easy to pass because nothing is really being taught.', "University high school has helped me grow over the last four years. It's faculty isn't the best mainly because of the absence of certain teachers for several different subjects. Subs are usually in place until they can find decent staff. However, the teachers i did have were decent at their job while some could've been a lot better.", 'My view in education level, in this vision now I discover that if you are not educated you nothing in ur community.', 'I have been there since 7th grade so the school just feels like home to me. I would like to see change the helping of students and the college process.', "I've made my fair share of friends during the 5 years I've stayed at UHS. We've been through a lot together. Not to mention the school is a fun place to be once you get used to it. It feels like a second home to me, I've been here so long, I don't think I would ever transfer from being a phoenix. It's what I've come to love about the place. I wouldn't want to be anywhere else", "I have attended University High School for 6 years, entering in their 7th-8th grade gifted and talented program. In those years I have add three principles ,  6 math teachers and an online math class , only three stayed the full  year and only two I've learned from. We do not have many clubs and classes are offend cut as well as staff. However we always been big  on school spirit and our athletics.  But overall the change in leadership in my school I think has mostly affected the students and the overall tone of the school . It went from so positive to now more on the negative side.", 'When going here the school was very inviting, it was very easy to make friends. The sports and activities were good. The academics were good and we were taught by very capable teachers.', 'Everything about University affects you in a different way. The environment was the best part for me, just being around so much positive people led me to like the school. Then the teachers are not as pushed about us as they should be, but they do make sure you are prepared for college. Overall, I love going to University and i will always be a pheonix.', 'Overall, my experience at University wasn’t bad. I was there since 7th grade (graduated 2017) and many changes occurred from 2011 to 2017. Changed principals 3 times, food options diminished, but I’ve met some amazing teachers that I will never forget. Unfortunately, many of these teachers are leaving the school due to the issues with the Newark Public Schools district, but hopefully the return of local control will encourage those teachers to stay', 'My experience at University High School has been as I rated, average. I appreciate that throughtout my time there, I have encountered a very diverse student ratio. Although the school is predominantly African American, there are many other races of people that also attend. At University High School people are free to express themselves through culture, religion, and art as they please.', 'I liked the diversity, kindness, and caring about University high school. Teachers cared about their students and students where kind to each other. I would not like to see anything changed!']

The class rooms need to be fixed and given proper materials, the school barely has computers and it's 2018.", "The school isn't clean, not good lunches. There's tons of roaches and ants. Some teachers can't teach in the right way. It used to be a magnet school but now it's horrible. The security check is horrible, a student even brought a gun one time. The area around the school isn't clean, tons of students smoking after school. Too much fights.", 'University High School sets high goals for all the students that attend here, in University there’s always a helping hand for you every need. The teachers will always assist you when you whenever you need the help. The staff are fair and polite. The students at University can always be trusted to come together and get a job done no matter them situations some students have with each other. It’s high school, of course there is going to be some type of drama, but the students always go to a responsible adult about their situations and don’t let it effect them and their grades in anyway. You can. expect many opportunities and fun experiences attending University High School in Newark, NJ.', 'What i liked about my school is the fact that it was discipline and the awesome teachers who worked with the students who were struggling with their courses and most importantly everyone helping each other out like a family because there’s a saying that it takes a village to raise a child.', 'I had an awesome experience at this school. I wish we can change the teacher and get teachers that actually teach. Overall this is a good school for sports but academics wise it’s too easy to pass because nothing is really being taught.', "University high school has helped me grow over the last four years. It's faculty isn't the best mainly because of the absence of certain teachers for several different subjects. Subs are usually in place until they can find decent staff. However, the teachers i did have were decent at their job while some could've been a lot better.", 'My view in education level, in this vision now I discover that if you are not educated you nothing in ur community.', 'I have been there since 7th grade so the school just feels like home to me. I would like to see change the helping of students and the college process.', "I've made my fair share of friends during the 5 years I've stayed at UHS. We've been through a lot together. Not to mention the school is a fun place to be once you get used to it. It feels like a second home to me, I've been here so long, I don't think I would ever transfer from being a phoenix. It's what I've come to love about the place. I wouldn't want to be anywhere else", "I have attended University High School for 6 years, entering in their 7th-8th grade gifted and talented program. In those years I have add three principles ,  6 math teachers and an online math class , only three stayed the full  year and only two I've learned from. We do not have many clubs and classes are offend cut as well as staff. However we always been big  on school spirit and our athletics.  But overall the change in leadership in my school I think has mostly affected the students and the overall tone of the school . It went from so positive to now more on the negative side.", 'When going here the school was very inviting, it was very easy to make friends. The sports and activities were good. The academics were good and we were taught by very capable teachers.', 'Everything about University affects you in a different way. The environment was the best part for me, just being around so much positive people led me to like the school. Then the teachers are not as pushed about us as they should be, but they do make sure you are prepared for college. Overall, I love going to University and i will always be a pheonix.', 'Overall, my experience at University wasn’t bad. I was there since 7th grade (graduated 2017) and many changes occurred from 2011 to 2017. Changed principals 3 times, food options diminished, but I’ve met some amazing teachers that I will never forget. Unfortunately, many of these teachers are leaving the school due to the issues with the Newark Public Schools district, but hopefully the return of local control will encourage those teachers to stay', 'My experience at University High School has been as I rated, average. I appreciate that throughtout my time there, I have encountered a very diverse student ratio. Although the school is predominantly African American, there are many other races of people that also attend. At University High School people are free to express themselves through culture, religion, and art as they please.', 'I liked the diversity, kindness, and caring about University high school. Teachers cared about their students and students where kind to each other. I would not like to see anything changed!']
column8: ['While attending this school they are several after school activities that help the students learn more. Our school provides after school activities that help the student engage with different type of subjects. Our clubs provide a fun time to the students at the same time being educational.', 'Attending this school for 4 years was an amazing experience. This school helps me develop academically and prepare me for college. I would go to this school again becasue it provides the best teaching methods and the best teachers. One of many favorite events  is when we do pep rally, as a school all students and teachers get to together and enjoy the day with interactive activities.', 'In my school our motto is to go from good to great, and with teachers that we have, we are getting closer and closer to accomplishing it. Every day I am surrounded by amazing teachers that help me excel in all subjects and motivate me to do better. In our school our teachers involve many type of teaching methods to keep the student engaged to the topic we are learning . Overall our teachers provide the best care to their student .', "This school has been really great to me. It has helped me progress and become a better person than who I was coming in. My working habits improved as well as my academics. Since I'm always surrounded by people with the same goal as me it pushes me to want to do better. I love the environment, the teachers, and my peers.", "There are some things that I would change if I were the principal, although I understand things aren't always in their hands.", 'You just have to show up, retain the knowledge and pass your test', "This school started off pushing us to our academic limits. The first principal wanted us all to strive, and if you did not adhere to the ambition of the school, you were kicked out. Once he left, the school started focusing on things that were unimportant. It just started to feel like nobody in the school's staff cared about the academics or the children anymore. I started taking AP classes, because the general classes were basic and not at all intriguing. All in all, I've had my fair share of good classes, and great teachers. I hope to try to change the atmosphere to be more academically challenging my senior year.", 'We have some teachers that are there for us but majority of the students do not have up to 4-5 teachers out of 8.', 'Well i rarely go to the nurse unless i need a band-aid or something for my classmate. I never been bullied, and i never felt unsafe in my school.', 'Well i played baseball for my school. The coach and other players where great i enjoyed my time with them and had fun win or lose during the seasons', 'It was new , i join the future law club and french club but i didst make it pass 2 years will it was fun and i enjoy law club but sports consume most of my time so i rarely had chance to make it to meetings.', 'Its okay it could be better.', "I never got in trouble so i wouldn't really know the disciplinary policies.", 'Well i never had a problem with any of my teachers. They were always willing to help, instruct and even joke around.', 'Well it started out as a hard school where academics would consume most of your time but as the year went on i found it easy to adjust to. It not super hard but it is challenging just pay attention in class an pass your test/quiz and you will do well.', 'I was well prepared for my next step into the world. I went to college prepared to do better than high school, eager to learn and make a difference.', 'The health and safety policies are almost always followed. Not too frequently do you see fights or bullying occurring. This high school was definitely a anti-bullying and drug and alcohol free school. The nurse provides the best the help that she can to make sure the students are secure.', 'We usually had Sub sandwiches, grilled cheese with broccoli, or chicken, accommodating by veggies and fruit. They even provided meals around certain holidays such thanksgiving and Christmas. The value and amount of the food is good and the timing is right for each grade.', "The administration staff along with the principal and parents made sure things such as bullying didn't occur. Attendance became a major priority because you would be written up or sentenced to court if you didn't go. Also if you did not wear uniform your parent was called or they gave you a uniform to put on.", 'The school spirit was very high, we attended all the games in support of just about every sport. The coaches were very determined and effective. The quality of the weight room was good along with other fitness programs such as yoga.']

column2: ["The teachers there were experienced and were understanding to students' needs. They will listen to students' requests and if doable it will be granted. Teachers use their own time to make sure students are doing well and that they have everything they need to pass and understand what they are learning.", "I went here in my freshman year and was told that this school would have good college readiness and good academics. And I can say after a year there it was a lie. The teachers were cool and the students made me feel like I was a part of the community, but academics wise this isn't a school for that if you want to excel.", 'I would like the school lunch to change, it is not very good. I would like the staff to be better at bonding with the students to get to know them better. I would like college preparations to start as early as 11th grade.', 'The teacher are strict but not too hard on kids, most of them care about us and want us to do good and become somebody when we grow up and they teach us to follow our dreams .', "during my school years at victory collegiate the thing's i like about the school is how the teacher  friendly. thing's i will like to be change is the poor academic, more college readiness classes and activity.", 'Victory tries to have a very intimate/caring relationship with their students. The staff cares about the students and you can see it by the way they push you both academically and personally. If I had the choice to relive my high school career I definitely would without a doubt! They want the best for each and every student that enters the building. They’re very supportive and understanding and that’s what I appreciated the most.', 'Victory collegiate is a great school. This school prepares their students beyond college, teachers care for their students and will do anything in their power for students to succeed.', 'The fact that I came from a small school before attending Victory Collegiate, it’s a big step up. Victory is a lot more organized than the other school I attended, Arts and Media Prep, there’s a lot more things to do in terms of clubs and after school activities and sports. Victory has many useful resources and administration that are actually here to help you.', "They really need to improve this school for the area it's in! Being here for this long you notice that the school only cares for their sports and students have little to no motivation to try.", 'I would like to see more options for classes and academics. Also, more clubs should be formed like said on their website.', 'I love how Victory Collegiate acts as a whole. We all are a family. The school overall is such a well rounded environment which may need a minor touch up on academics.', 'Academically the school is alright in the classes they do offer of course. Personally I wish the school offer more interesting classes and courses and more clubs and resources. The students do participate in class, we often have great classroom discussion. The teacher teaching methods could be a little better and strategically presented but they are quite understandable is just at times students tend to get lost during the process of the teacher transferring the knowledge to the students.', "The social scene in this school its quite great. We are a school within a campus so other schools in the campus do threating the environment and well being of kids in my school. Overall most of the kids are social like many individuals during adolescences they do tend to make mistakes. Its predominantly black, peer pressure doesn't occur as much. Students including freshman adapt pretty quickly and don't face many obstacles and at many times feel safe in school But everything could be better.", "The extracurricular that are offered to being with, students choose not to take nor participate in. They have art, music, dance etc. In a school with more than 130 students the number of students in after-school activity makes the population of the school seem low. I believe the reason why this occurs is because teacher don't really motivate students to step out of their common ground, to explore and  try something new. Throughout my high school year I've learn that their are two types of teacher. First type of teacher are teachers who teach just to teach whether the kids listen or not the teacher doesn't really care nor tries to get involved and push the student to their full potential and do it more for the money, Second type of teacher are teachers who love their jobs and inspire students to be the best they can and push them to follow their dreams and victory has more of the first then the second.", "My overall experience in this school was good but could of been great. From my freshman year and sophomore year I didn't really know much about the system. Junior year I started to realize a lot about the school. Although I was taking AP classes a lot of other classes that I wish were there weren't. I asked my dean and many other teacher why it was this way and only answer they gave me was their isn't enough money to hire teacher in that degree. I also question why the sports we had are sports that every other school in the world has, if we want student to have a higher chance in earning a  scholarship in sports why not cricket or a sport that not many schools offers. I just wish the school opened up more opportunities", "I  once was two that there are two type of teachers. There is one teacher who they are more interesting in getting their money and don't really push the kids knowing that the kid has potential. Second one teacher with passion and devote themselves and are even willing to stay afterschool and help those in need.  Unfortunately in my school we have more of the first example than the second example", "With a lack of pedigree and a lackluster learning environment, I wish I didn't go to this school. I'm smart, but I think I could have been smarter if I went to another school. It's a series of unfortunate events that lead me there, but at least I graduated with honors.", "PURPOSE is the school's motto. You will soon lice by it.", "There are a lot of changes that need to be made such as the uniform policy it isn't followed through all the time. They ned to be more consistent", "Never aren't many choices with extracurricular activities, and the ones that are their many students do not attend."]

column6: ['Their are very limited options and if your not on a sports team you really cant use the weight room which sucks.', 'The teachers at this school care about the students as long as they are willing to learn and try to understand the work. If not then the students will struggle on their own.', 'It was a difficult transition from high school to college. After a while you get use to it.', 'Overall, I love this school, although it was a rocky social experience, at the end it all paid off with the greatest learning experience I have ever had. Administration are there to help you when school is in session. THey get you ready for your future and having a purpose in your life is very important. Best believe, when you leave you will be quoting some of your teachers or one of the staff. It feels like a "professional family".', 'The most important thing about this school is that academia is taken seriously. It looks like the curriculum for most of the classes are well organized and easy to manipulate around by observing the reachers. You usually learn more than expected if you are that type of student, which i love. Left this school knowing too much which helped me in college.', "The teachers are all nice, professional, fun & helpful. They are all knowledgeable about their subjects and they are all willing to help you if needed after school or during lunch. Even if it is isn't about the actual subject.", 'Since being there, there were more after school activities then, Im not too sure about now, but there were activities like Dance, Cheerleading, Homework Help, etc. The administration supported us a bunch during the duration of these activities.', 'South Shore Vikings are well supported. At least the basketball & football teams are. The athletic facilities could be a lot better and not just open to the athletes. Every school within south shore is very involved in the sports events especially with the basketball team!', 'The administration are wonderful people. Getting to know them for four years made me the best person I am today. Learning from them helped me through MOST of college. THey do take dress code, attendance very seriously, but of course in a polite and rigorous manner. Policies are never taken lightly but they are always here to help with anything.', "Victory Collegiate can be any school you want it to be. They are very welcoming and generous. Never take this school for granted, make the right friends and the right connections and you'll be set. The teachers there actually care about you and your grades.", 'We could use a bit more space because we share the school with more than 5 other schools.', 'The teams win a lot, and the player and coaches work hard. Our school name is "Victory" Collegiate High School, and everyday is a Victory for us.', 'The students act like their a family, always looking out for each other', "The teacher's love their jobs and care for the students", "The teachers don't give a lot of homework or tests.", 'The teachers are willing to get up,their lunch to help students.', 'The teachers are great and the work is challenging.                     ', 'I feel really safe and secure at this school.      ', 'The teachers teachings are great but some of the time its the lack of technology.', 'There are basketball teams, soccer, football, track, cheer leading etc.']

column1: Mott Haven Village Prep High School
column2: ['I had a great experience at Mott Have Village Prep, I learned a lot and the staff helped me to grow and become a better person overall.', "My experience in Mott Haven Village Preparatory has been good. I've built strong relationship with staff and many teachers.  The school offers many sports like flag  football, football, soccer, softball, volleyball, track, and many others.  Asides from this great feature, we don't have many a lot of parent involvement or average food. The school food is not as great. Most of the time the drinks (milk & juice) are frozen and can't be drinkable. There has been a lot of complains from my peers about the smell, taste, and food temperature.", "I'm a Junior at MHVP and I have experience friendship and got involved in some of the activities at the school. I develop more of my skills, also  I learned more about what I want to do after high school and teachers will always be a good help for advices.", 'What I liked about Mott Haven Village Prep High School was that I learned how I can prepare for college and become the best student I can be. I met a lot of great friends. However, I would have liked to have seen more diversity in school as well as much Advanced Placement classes for all students.', "This school is what you make of it. There are teachers who genuinely care about seeing you succeed and few don't. Most teachers don't stay for more than a few years, they get tired of the kind of students they have to deal with. A lot of kids don't care about school and are only there because of they have to be. On the other hand, there are some kids who are really driven and focused on doing well in school. Fights break out easily. There isn't much of a sense of unity. Hang around the right kind of people and you'll be alright.", 'My experience at MHVP has been more than amazing ! I learned to be independent and responsible for my actions. Most importantly I learned how to transition from a young teenager into a young adult. The college preparation has really helped me become more excited and driven to attending college and gaining my degree. Not everyone values their education but those that do will have a memorable experience in High school and anywhere they go.', 'I like how my school is like a family. And how everyone is always involved in something good. Teachers in my school try hard to get resources and help for us students in my school.', "Within a couple of months around the South Bronx campus, it's easy to find a certain bond with people of all ages, sizes, and colors. The faculty members put in a great deal of effort to make this school the safest and soundest environment in the borough. Adults do what they can on a daily basis to pass down as much knowledge as possible to the kids. The only problem is, some students aren't motivated. I'm hoping for the graduation rate to increase after I leave to college. It's up to the students if they want to put in the work and make something out of their lives. It takes time for individuals to realize average isn't enough. Our community needs to settle for the best, not satisfactory results. Slowly but surely, progress is being made.", 'my experience at experience mott haven was the best high school anyone can ask for .The teaches treated all the students like children of their own and had us feeling very safe . when we need anything we can always count on them not matter what .', "This school is somewhat safe mostly everyone knows everyone so it's good to say it's pretty safe for the most part.", 'Opportunities at this school is giving but not everyone wants to be apart of anything after schools hours.', "The overall quality of teachers, teaching style, knowledge, interest in students, communication skills, and consistency in grading at my school is not that great I feel that some teachers have most of this down pack but the others don't try and their best to communicate with the students.", 'it could use some renovation and offer more things to do.', 'Sports is a major deal', 'I would do certain events over if i could', 'They use the best approach to help you learn', 'Staff really does there work', 'I did not feel prepared for college', 'There is no real variety of clubs', 'The school is involved in having students prosper.']
