Slowly but surely, progress is being made.", 'my experience at experience mott haven was the best high school anyone can ask for .The teaches treated all the students like children of their own and had us feeling very safe . when we need anything we can always count on them not matter what .', "This school is somewhat safe mostly everyone knows everyone so it's good to say it's pretty safe for the most part.", 'Opportunities at this school is giving but not everyone wants to be apart of anything after schools hours.', "The overall quality of teachers, teaching style, knowledge, interest in students, communication skills, and consistency in grading at my school is not that great I feel that some teachers have most of this down pack but the others don't try and their best to communicate with the students.", 'it could use some renovation and offer more things to do.', 'Sports is a major deal', 'I would do certain events over if i could', 'They use the best approach to help you learn', 'Staff really does there work', 'I did not feel prepared for college', 'There is no real variety of clubs', 'The school is involved in having students prosper.']
column6: ['I had a great experience at Mott Have Village Prep, I learned a lot and the staff helped me to grow and become a better person overall.', "My experience in Mott Haven Village Preparatory has been good. I've built strong relationship with staff and many teachers.  The school offers many sports like flag  football, football, soccer, softball, volleyball, track, and many others.  Asides from this great feature, we don't have many a lot of parent involvement or average food. The school food is not as great. Most of the time the drinks (milk & juice) are frozen and can't be drinkable. There has been a lot of complains from my peers about the smell, taste, and food temperature.", "I'm a Junior at MHVP and I have experience friendship and got involved in some of the activities at the school. I develop more of my skills, also  I learned more about what I want to do after high school and teachers will always be a good help for advices.", 'What I liked about Mott Haven Village Prep High School was that I learned how I can prepare for college and become the best student I can be. I met a lot of great friends. However, I would have liked to have seen more diversity in school as well as much Advanced Placement classes for all students.', "This school is what you make of it. There are teachers who genuinely care about seeing you succeed and few don't. Most teachers don't stay for more than a few years, they get tired of the kind of students they have to deal with. A lot of kids don't care about school and are only there because of they have to be. On the other hand, there are some kids who are really driven and focused on doing well in school. Fights break out easily. There isn't much of a sense of unity. Hang around the right kind of people and you'll be alright.", 'My experience at MHVP has been more than amazing ! I learned to be independent and responsible for my actions. Most importantly I learned how to transition from a young teenager into a young adult. The college preparation has really helped me become more excited and driven to attending college and gaining my degree. Not everyone values their education but those that do will have a memorable experience in High school and anywhere they go.', 'I like how my school is like a family. And how everyone is always involved in something good. Teachers in my school try hard to get resources and help for us students in my school.', "Within a couple of months around the South Bronx campus, it's easy to find a certain bond with people of all ages, sizes, and colors. The faculty members put in a great deal of effort to make this school the safest and soundest environment in the borough. Adults do what they can on a daily basis to pass down as much knowledge as possible to the kids. The only problem is, some students aren't motivated. I'm hoping for the graduation rate to increase after I leave to college. It's up to the students if they want to put in the work and make something out of their lives. It takes time for individuals to realize average isn't enough. Our community needs to settle for the best, not satisfactory results. Slowly but surely, progress is being made.", 'my experience at experience mott haven was the best high school anyone can ask for .The teaches treated all the students like children of their own and had us feeling very safe . when we need anything we can always count on them not matter what .', "This school is somewhat safe mostly everyone knows everyone so it's good to say it's pretty safe for the most part.", 'Opportunities at this school is giving but not everyone wants to be apart of anything after schools hours.', "The overall quality of teachers, teaching style, knowledge, interest in students, communication skills, and consistency in grading at my school is not that great I feel that some teachers have most of this down pack but the others don't try and their best to communicate with the students.", 'it could use some renovation and offer more things to do.', 'Sports is a major deal', 'I would do certain events over if i could', 'They use the best approach to help you learn', 'Staff really does there work', 'I did not feel prepared for college', 'There is no real variety of clubs', 'The school is involved in having students prosper.']

column1: El Puente Academy for Peace & Justice
column2: ['Being at this school helped me discover new things about myself and what I am capable of doing. It’s the place where I could go to a teacher and talk to them as if they were a friend and give you advice and care for you', 'El puente is a poor school overall. Although the teachers are excellent, and classes are small so you get to interact with one another, the academics side of things are horrible and needs an improvement.', 'My overall experience in El Puente Academy for Peace & Justice has been good. I like the staff, very supportive teachers that are always there to help you.', 'My overall experience at El Puente Academy for Peace and Justice has been eventful. There are opportunities to take college courses at the school during the four years of my stay. Most of the staff members were very pleasant and good at educating me. One thing that the school can improve on is the availability of AP classes.', 'El Puente Academy is a environment in which I feel safe and comfortable with my peers and self. I learned a lot about my ancestors and my cultural background that I did not know about before. I learned about the social issues that revolves in society, that I was once naive to notice about racism and gender inequality.', "I loved the atmosphere. I graduated back in 2016 and this school has definitely left an impression on me. The staff cares and they don't just leave their work at school, they bring it home. They know everyone by name and try to have as close of a relationship as they can with student just to know that people care. Very, very into culture as well.", 'El Puente Academy is a good school it gets many students involved in the community to help out and to enjoy are selfs .', 'I love that not only you learn about all these other subjects in the school but you learn more about yourself and more about your culture and ancestors as you grow and advance in each grade.', 'I graduated from El Puente Academy in 2016 and never would I have thought that I would miss a school or environment so much. Truly a great school that worries more about the students than just getting paid.', 'The teachers were very good at making the topics interesting which made it so that the whole class wanted to be involved in the lesson.', 'El Puente Academy for peace and justice is not a school its more like a family. The professors show a great deal of interest in making sure the students are understanding the academics. The go above and beyond to help in any way they can. My adviser at the time made it easy for me to talk to her not only about school, but life in general. I would recommend this school to everyone I know.', 'This school does many shows to show student talents. Disrespectful people are everywhere. If I had to do it again I would', 'Still have a lot to learn']

['Honestly, it has become a better school over the years and this year the staff is putting a lot of effort into making it a better high school in order to concentrate and for the students safety.', 'when I transferred to Barringer high , I met good friends who are from different part of the world with top grades. I have had the opportunity to learn more about other people’s culture and learned to love them. The teachers are very cool and they care, so do the counselors and other staffs. Attending this school, I have learned from several people in several ways that a school is what ‘you’ make it , and not what it was before you got there. It’s up to the students to decide what they want their schools to be. The fact that the school is located in one of the most dangerous cities in America, Newark, has strengthen me vigorously. I am able to deal with loss even better now . And if I ever learnt anything In Barringer high school, Newark,NJ, it’s that things don’t get easier , we just get stronger .', 'I liked how the teachers went out their way to make sure I succeeded in learning and making it to graduation. I wish the school guidance department would have let me know I could have filed for scholarships as early as thirteen years old. It would help alot if that knowledge was shared then instead of being told to do it your senior year.', 'May not be the best but clearly  not the worst, with plenty of courses and classes for advanced and easy goers alike.', "I was fortunate enough to have some great teachers guide me and get me ready for life outside of high school but if it wasn't for these few teachers I would not be college ready. Barringer needs to focus more on getting the seniors college ready so they won't struggle or at least be a little more prepared.", "Barringer STEAM high school throughout the years, I've experienced the ups and downs of being a student here. Community isn't for everyone.", 'Barringer High School is a school that is not very diverse. Barrringer High School teaches students academically and the school take students to college fairs encouraging them to go to college. What I will like Barringer High School to improve in is for them to give more advance placement classes to students to enable them to be more prepare for college.', 'My experience at Barringer was very great. They counselor are people that help students the right college choice and they make sure their kids graduates. I would like to see changes in academics. Barringers is a school that teaches but they need to step up in prepare their students for college. They also need to create more programs that prepare students for public exams..', 'It was a harrowing experience i hope to never go through again. I have never been to such a school in my life, and if I could go back to fix it, I would.', 'Barringer High School ( Academy Of S.T.E.A.M) is now a good school were dedicated student goes to to get their a better future.I recommend everyone to come to this school and school for their self and know how things have changed over years. I love this school because the teacher focus on student.', "I enjoyed the friendships I made, but the administration's drama went around spread around quickly. The food was not as good as I wish it could have been. Some teachers did care about me and tried motivating me.", 'The school is very disliked by the students in them lacking school spirit because the rules and restrictions. Among with unreliable teachers and the teachers that care but get disrespected by students need to be fixed. The academic rigor has to be boosted and in-forced. The Faculty and Administration has to get the school together and plan and not do things last minute.', 'the staff are rude and dont care about their students . some Teachers  are awesome you will always remember them .Need better math teachers and lunch food needs to be cook more  .Didnt prepare me or anyone for college.', 'I like that there were teachers that really cared about you. The experience was great because although I did not have the best education I know that it is not the end. The experience pushed me to see life after a school that did not provide the best of a learnings experience.']

['My experience has been great so far ..I have experienced and learned a lot from school and still learning.Teachers are awesome,lessons understandable and if you got problems ask and you surely will be taught to your understanding', 'In the school of law and finance, I really love how the school and students are always willing to try out new things and voice out their opinions whenever things are wrong. Teachers and staffs in the school tremendously understanding and encouraging to students. If I could change something in the school I would like them allow junior and seniors to keep their phones.', 'What i liked about the bronx school of law and finance is that some teachers were helpfull and made you feel comfortable around them. What i felt like i could change is the bias things with the college counselors and the lack of help they gave', 'There is an amazing amount of opportunities available for students. Such as internships, sport activities, and after school programs.', 'I like how the administration are willing to go out of their to make sure you are getting all the resources you need in all  Academic areas.', 'Law and finance classes are offered as well as government, physical education, health, economics, Latin, art, music, and the liberal arts classes as well as AP classes like statistics, pre calculus, environmental science, and English. the classes largely vary which is great. There eve is a service class. The work is manageable as long as students try and most teachers are easy to talk to and know how to make the lesson entertaining.', "Students are fairly involved in activities. Seldom students are actually bullied because we're all different and majority of students are accepting of that. No ones judge on their sexual orientation or race.", "I'm not too aware of all the extra curricular activities and clubs at the school but of the ones that I do know they are okay to be in. I believe in my freshman year there where more clubs available and the administration was more hands on but as the years progress and a lot of teachers left things changed", "My most memorable experiences defiantly comes from the friends I made and the bonds I've had with some teachers. What makes this school unique is that it's has a variety of ethnicities and cultures that are a part of it. Students are able to learn about different cultures simply by making friends. On the other hand the school is a bit unorganized and at times lenient when they should be strict about enforcing rules. Other than that a pretty good school.", "The teachers care for the students and want them to learn. The aid them if they're struggling and even make bonds with the students so the environment is more light and easy way to learn in", 'The security guards pick and choose who to search thoroughly and let others go without a problem. Some students have got into the school with illegal things yet the security guards will hold students until they are late for class, making them empty each and every compartment of their bag because they mistook a metal pen for an electronic cigarette. If an injury on the school grounds were to take place the school staff are more concerned about themselves than the condition of the student. The fire alarms are pulled frequently and yet no one is caught on camera. The fire extinguisher exploded one time.They do not respond immediately to reported fights and allegedly their was an intruder in the building one time.', 'The students are not really committed. The instructors fail to motivate the students. Since the clubs heavily rely on teams and the majority are unwilling to do their part, they are not very competitive. Moot Court and Mock Trial are fun to experience. Going up against students from other schools and meeting real judges and lawyers are amazing opportunities but the team must be functional. Each year, they lack the confidence or just slack off. It is fun and life-altering but when it comes to the ambitious and dedicated, my advice is, try outside of school activities like the DEA program and College Now.', 'The clubs and activities were not very engaging. They really rely on the commitment of the students as a team and that is lack every year. The teachers lack the authority to push the students harder and/or fail to inspire them. The football team is pretty good but the academic teams are nothing but a disappointment. As a former part of the Moot Court, Mock Trail and Latin Clubs, I will say that my time would have better been spent elsewhere. Good impressions and high ambition is wasted here.', "The parents don't care about the students education", "They do try to help the best that they it's the students that is the problem", 'There are a lot of security on every floor. The school nurse is very good even though you have to come back later because their be so much kids down there.', 'The students are very committed to their team and practice everyday. The after school activities are great if more people showed up. The school can have more fun ideas for after school.', 'This school pushes you to do your best and wants you to get a advanced diploma. I would choose this school again because they want to see you do better and the sports teams are great.', 'The teachers can work better on trying to get the students more involve with the lesson. Also they should listen to the students ideas about certain topics.', "Bronx School of Law and Finance is a good school to a certain extent. I would not choose this school again because the staff doesn't handle the students properly. As a senior I would have expected privileges, trips, parties, or a simple bake sale. Everything is so unorganized , we have unexpected meetings that get really out of hand because everything is thrown at us rather than getting help by teachers. Freshmen and sophmore year was rough still trying to understand whats going on in such a small school."]

Freshmen and sophmore year was rough still trying to understand whats going on in such a small school."]
column6: ['Some teachers are better at engaging with the students and explaining what they are teaching than others. Some teachers are there to get a check at the end of the week and others actually show students that they care.', 'In some of my classes I did learn quite a lot about life beyond school. However, in most of my classes I did not learn much at all. The school was daunting even. In a sense it did teach us that we have to work hard on our own. A lot of times I had to go out and purchase books to prepare for the test myself.', 'think ouir safey at JKF campus is great', 'school lunch , well it you are hungry or have practice later in the day then yeah eat up', 'its okay , our fitness opportunities come be better', 'the teachers at bronx school of law and finance are every helpful and try to give all the help that is possible to motivate their students', 'there could be some improvements with the dress code , do not really think our dress code is a dress code . should be much strict with the dress code .', 'In my school of Bronx school of Law and Finance has great resources and great faculty who cares and want you to succeeded.', 'The school administration does the best it can to provide help and support to students and parents.', "Most of the culture kids keep to themselves unless there is multi-cultural night. Peer pressure doesn't really effect kids in my school. If most kids don't find acceptance in the school they look for it elsewhere.", "The availability of after schools programs in my school are at good rate. Many students don't attend these afterschool programs for various reasons.", 'The safety in my school is not average to other schools. It is is taken to another level because of the metal detectors. At times it is uncomfortable but it is helpful from preventing weapons from entering the school. We have special security measures we practice such as soft lockdowns, lockdowns, shelter ins and evacuations. These measure come in hand when it is necessary. My schools has one of the best health programs because we have accessibility to a clinic. Here at this clinic you can schedule, physicals, check ups, emergency treatment, dental appointments and many other health related needs.', "The academics in my schools are challenging at times but are fairly average. We have had a few AP classes over the years but most of them have been cut out because of the schools budget. The teachers in my school challenge students with work but don't always offer proper tutoring for us.", "The school food fairly good from time to time. The schools menu is chose by the board of education  health services, students have no control over it. There tend to be healthy food options a lot but many of them don't taste good.", 'The safety in my school is not average to other schools. It is is taken to another level because of the metal detectors. At times it is uncomfortable but it is helpful from preventing weapons from entering the school. We have special security measures we practice such as soft lockdowns, lockdowns, shelter ins and evacuations. These measure come in hand when it is necessary. My schools has one of the best health programs because we have accessibility to a clinic. Here at this clinic you can schedule, physicals, check ups, emergency treatment, dental appointments and many other health related needs.', 'The adminisration had an excellent mission statement that was strongly carried out from when the school first opened til now', 'All of the teachers showed that they loved what they were doing and supported all of us no matter what.', 'I know alot of me fellow students are are doing amazing with themslves after going to this school', 'It was the best four years of my life', 'There was always somethign available for you to get involved in. Even internships.']

column2: ['This school is one of the best transfer schools you can attend. The staff here safe friendly, they’re always available to help you with whatever you need, and the school’s culture has made me feel welcomed.', "Harlem Renaissance is a great school if you know what you are there to do. you can get lost easily if you don't focus on whats important.", 'My experience here in Harlem Renaissance has definantly changed my perspective of the world. I no long feel small nor alone. Due to my experience there I learned how to grow intellectually into the young women I am today. The staff and teachers are not but a great help to the community and provide me and my other classmates with everything needed in order to succeed. Before coming to this school I had no desire on going to college and saw myself going down the wrong path, however now that I have been in this school for the past year or so it’s been nothing but blessings. One thing that I do hope to see change in over the course of the years is the no going outside for lunch policy. I feel that as mature young adults we should be able to go outside for lunch and know that coming back to class should be our number one priority throughout the day. It is known to be a responsibility.', 'My experience at attending Harlem renaissance was an wonderful experience , this school was very helpful I entered this school in September 2013 with 6 credits and 0 regents I graduated June 2016 with 44 credits and 5 regents now I am looking to attend " Georgia state university " but I don\'t know where to start', 'I liked how the staff is so friendly and willing to help. The diversity of foreign students always so eager to learn. I also enjoyed how rewarding it  is to get good grades by showing up and doing your work. The school is very helpful when it comes to college readiness. There are many college trips and events encouraging student to want to do better and enroll. It would be better if the attendance percentage was higher.', 'As a studen I would like to see more people engaged in their classes and take the core values into value and be eager to learn.', 'My expiercence at Harlem Renaissance high school Is Great. The teachers help to motivate students to do their best. Its a safe environment to be in.', 'The teachers at this school are very helpful and outgoing they make sure they do they job to help a student understand and get where they need to be. The teachers also communicate with students very well except for the students who likes to b jerks and act a fool / be the class clown.', "The academics offered at this school such as A.P English classes , People you can talk to when you're going through things , people to talk to about your health , lunch classes and after school classes for credits and regent prep. The teachers are very helpful and if you are behind in work the teaches give you a workload of work to be due within two days or work to make up and if not then you fail on you chance because you were given another chance / opportunity. Close to regent time there is an after school class for regent prep there are also lunch classes for regent prep and credit recovery .", 'There is a lunch program instead of going to lunch Ms.Allison invites an lady from mount Sinai to come teach and talk about health and peer pressure and what people go through in relationships , depression and etc. This class is called " The Lunch Health Class " and the credit goes / count for whatever you are missing gym or health.', "The extracurricular opportunities at this school such as the CB units is a combinations of everything such as karate , art , music , dance , etc . These opportunities goes as electives credits or as any credit you're missing depending on which CB unit you pick.", 'If I had to do it all over again yes I would attend this school and just work on my attendance. This is a good school and they actually give you the opportunity to rebuild , renew , and restore ! Everyone in this school are very helpful and make sure they do their job to get students to graduate.', "The teachers at Harlem Renaissance High School are very helpful to their students and outgoing for their students. The teachers tell you what you need and what you need to get done to get out of the school. The teachers does a good job teaching they explain step by step and if a student doesn't understand they go over it multiple times with the class until a students gets it even after explaining to the class multiple times the teacher will come over to the student and explain to make sure the student understand . I went into Harlem Renaissance High School with 6 credits and 0 regents , I left out with 44 credits and 5 regents . It's the best school ever I'm going to miss this school", 'Overall this school is what you make it . Just get in and get out , making friends is not a wise decision because most students here are going to slow you down. Its an alternative school and most students who attend are in their 6th , 7th year of their high school career , have children , have been previously incarcerated or kicked out of their old schools. This is not a school you should expect to go to and have a real high school experience. You have to lock up your cell phone when you come in , surprise metal detectors some days , NO SPORTS TEAMS , its just basically a last resort school for people who have no other options and need something quick placed in the middle of the hood. Teachers choose their favorites and if you\'re not one you\'ll be treated less , kids make fun of other kids , the student body is basically divided by race except the few "nerds" who get in where they fit in or sit alone . dont come here for anything except to stay to yourself and make it out . VERY EASY A\'s , you get alot of credits per semester can make it out very quickly.']

column1: Frederick Douglass Academy IV Secondary School
column2: ["The experience I remember the most was how dedicated the teachers were with the students. Some really keep in contact after graduation and continue to want the best for you. They've shown so much love and care it was really appreciated and so necessary. i do hope some day this school can be viewed as one of the top schools in it's district, it certainly portrays itself that way.", 'My school is just average. ', 'Freshman and Sophomore year the students wore the full uniform attire, white t-shirt with gray pants or a skirt. There was no jeans, mini skirts, tees and v-necks. When it came to Junior and Senior years the children wore everything but uniform. ', 'It is not difficult at all to be accepted into this school, there is no test involved, anyone can get in retarded or intelligent. But it is a competition to be salutatorian or valedictorian, everyone wants that title.', "The teachers are excellent and very helpful.Yes it's difficult to have a one on one session with them because they have so many students to deal with. Otherwise, teachers don't just focus on your education they care about your personal life.", 'In the school there has been fights, students smoking in the bathroom, gang activity where the police had to come up to the school several times.', 'This is school had no AP courses, workload, scheduling process nothing.Fredrick Douglass was just an average high school.', 'Well when it came to the students senior year the guidance counselor started to make sure we were prepared for the real world/college. But it was to late because all of us was ready, we have been accepted to many colleges and has visited many universities also.', 'The extracurricular activities in this school are only for females their are no after school activities for the males at all. For the females, you have dance, step and Cheerleading. Their is one coed activity, student government.....ashame. The boys have protest for a basketball team but the principal never made an effort.', 'The school lunch is excellent majority of the time. It seems as the lunch ladies take their time with the food to make sure it satisfies the children taste. Sometimes their is veggies on the plate and then their is just barbecue chicken with plantains and rice. My best bet is to eat school lunch because its well....free.  ', "I graduated from this school and have no regrets but I am one of few to say that I did it alone. It takes self-dedication to make it out; the environment is everyman for themselves. Either you fail or you pass, either way the teacher is being paid. It deserves a D because there are NO extra curricular activities and most of the teachers don't really care.", 'The food is claimed to be healthy for us, but it tastes horrible. Since the food is horrible majority of the students go to the store or order food from the local chinese store or pizza shop.', 'The teachers are great. Majority of them are motivational speakers and only want the best for the students.A few of them have no respect, meaning they will not say, "Good morning" while coming in the school. The teachers take time to help a student with an exam, homework, etc. and the student will learn everything they need to know after the session.']

['Hey, my name is Renatta Isaacs and my experience at School for Democracy & Leadership was great because I saw myself grow from six grade until where I am today. Which is my reading skills and writing skills has improved. Also I like that SDL have teachers who care about your education and anyother problems that you have. But one thing I would like to change is that they have more programs and more fun trips for everyone.', 'I must say that being apart of the SDL community was truly a blessing and sometimes a pain.SDL was one of the few schools to have implemented restorative justice measures into the school culture. This is definitely what made it unique. It is also a very small school which gives students that hands on learning experience they need. I  have to admit that SDL had no diversity, the school had only blacks (Caribbean-Americans). Sometimes students need to be exposed to other groups of people to grow. SDL also lacked discipline and structure. Other than that it is indeed a great school.', 'Going to a school in my community was convenient. I met alot of compassionate teachers and made long term relationships with some students. I would like to see more unity within the 4 different schools in the Wingate campus. ', 'I would definitely recommend this school to students because it offers a great staff who are willing to help and aid in helping you to achieve your success.', 'When it comes to athletics and fitness at my school you always have an option and there is always team work sadly not all teams get the full support of the students but when they do show support it lifts the school spirit. Sports is mainly dominated by the males due to the fact that females would rather watch and cheer on teams than get engaged.', 'The teachers at my school seems very dedicated to their jobs. They often time sacrifice their personal time to assist students with what ever they need, from school work to personal issues. I must say they are a few students who find it hard to approach teachers when it comes to certain situations because they make it clear that they are strictly about school.', 'There are a lot extracurricular opportunities at my school. Majority of these clubs were requested by students but only a few of them get the full commitment of the students. All extracurricular activities receive strong support from their administration mainly because their aim is to see students involved in school activities', 'The teachers are cool people', 'We get to play against the staff a few times a year in football, steal the bacon, basketball. Its a lot of fun.', 'Theyre very nice and caring', "SDL was an amazing experience. I've met teachers that didn't only care about me academically but as a person as well. I'll never forget the 4 years I spent there.", "It can be better. I would've love AP classes.", 'The food really improved this year. It was great. My friends and I ate it almost everyday.', 'Staff and administration are the most patient and caring. They are strict when needed but welcoming and easy to talk to.', 'Children bully each other. Staff and administration work hard to crack down on it.', 'Some teachers and staff come out to support the students. Some students come out. More could come.', 'I feel safe in my high school i never felt threatened or in harms way. The nurse is actually a full running clinic through kings county so you could go their for anything because its a full running clinic.', "Most of the teachers I have had in my high school loved teaching us. They would help us with whatever we needed. And if one teacher didn't have time another would. They would offer to stay after school if you had questions or needed help with your homework. The teachers were really dedicated to their jobs.", 'In my school the guidance counselors are amazing. They would help you with everything you need to graduate and go on to college. The counselors would review your transcript twice every year to make sure you have your credits and are on track to graduate with the rest of your class. My school offers college course with Brooklyn College so a lot of the students would go take courses at Brooklyn College for college credit.', 'The school lunch is very affordable for students who cant afford to pay. They have reduced lunch so the either pay a reduced price or free lunch. The lunch option vary from time to time. They always have a healthy option for those who want to try a vegetarian dish. They serve a lot of fruit and water to the students. The snacks in the vending machines are very healthy and students are quick to buy it. ']

column1: Brooklyn Academy of Science & the Environment
column2: ['I am currently a senior at Base high school and I like that we have different types of clubs like hiking,garden crew, guitar , recycling,otaku.My favorite part about Base though are the different types of science class we have like Earth science, geology, science and sustainability, chemistry, living environment, AP biology, animal behavior, anatomy.The only thing I wish to change is more math  and AP classes', 'The environment for studying is good with great teaches and staff. There are variety of programs an individual can do every year and everyone is prepared for college even before their senior year academically. Overall it’s a good school if you have an academic mentality.', 'My experience in High School was a pleasent one. I loved the school, besides some of the people that were not nice. Overall, I enjoyed my highschool years and have gotten awesome teachers and friends, Some of which I am still friends with to this day. What I would like to see change is a better school atmosphere and to make learning more fun.', 'Brooklyn Academy for Science and the Environment is a memorable experience with various different programs and extra curricular activities. One thing i would change is to add more advanced placement classes.', "Many internships but they are not so interesting. Lack of college readiness. Teachers are nice. Also lack of sports. Some staff's are rude towards the students. Class schedule format cant be negotiated with the teachers or dean as much.", 'Super Wednesday is after school activity where students can finish missed work and boost there grades up. Also, students play a full court basketball game against each other and sometimes against teachers.', 'My favorite experience was when I joined the JV Varsity basketball team. This school is small and you could make a lot of friends. This has less opportunities for there school than most schools. I guess because its not a well known school', 'Some teachers teach a lesson till its clear to the students engaged in the topics. It takes some teachers a while to update grades on jupitered/jupitergrades.', 'the teachers at my school realy care about the students and want everyone to pass. They offer after school help and we have supper wednesdays where you make up anywork you have missed. The teachers are very hard on us because they want the best for our future.', 'Even though there are things that I would like to change or improve the school is very good. The teachers & administration all work to ensure the students graduation', 'The school is a great school as long as you get to know mature people ans become friends with people that will help you through your years of highschool. You will be totally fine.', 'Quit going to lunch after my first year. Same thing every week.', 'Very strict with dress code. Guidance could care less about you. They give off the feeling they are more annoyed with you than willing to help with any issues', 'Pretty reasonable for most of them. They tried very hard to get you to stay focused and provided many opportunities to fix your grade', 'I was never into sports but I did enjoy the pool. It was well kept', 'Clubs were created by students, but always fell through. No club lasted for long and teachers seem very annoyed to give up their personal time to supervise one.', 'The school is no where near the best and I felt very unprepared for college.', 'Mostly all of the teachers know how to make a student have a better understanding of the lessons , some teachers just give paper work to do and thats it , they dont really help you understand the topic better . Grading , teachers say homework counts as 10% of your grade but really counts about 80% of your grade , exams and interims brig down your grade alot , no matter all the hard effort that was put to in the marking period can be severely brong down by one test .', 'The only thing i like about the school are the teachers , you get to know them better during trips when they\'re not teaching and find out they are really cool . The friends ive made and the "friends" ive lost :) . I would choose this school again just because im so used to it and i dont think ill be the same in any other school .', 'All the school nurse does is gives you a bag of ice . There are physical fights occasionally , inside and outside the school . Security measures are still in effect and good . I just dont feel safe around the school .']

column8: ['the worst school wouldnt recommend to anyone ever', 'worst food i ever seen or tasted in my life', 'very terrible service so bad', 'really  would not recommend this school to anyone', 'Not that much to choose from', 'It awesome so many activities', 'The school is very safe', 'The guidance counselors, principal, assistant principals, etc. are always looking out for great opportunities.', "You can definitely go home saying you've learned somethin new/ got a better understanding", 'With some, you could never ask for better teachers', 'If you need help with any classes, the teachers will always be willing to stay for a while after school with you. they have a great after school program for anyone who needs extra credit', 'There is a nice variety of sports. If you want to start a team, you can easily start one (with permission of course)', "Though the school is small,  it is a very nice school. You really do learn something everyday. It's only a great experience if you make it a great experience.", 'Guidance counselor is always there if you need anything. Not enough advance technology in classrooms.', 'The race issue is okay because everybody respect each other culture.', 'Me personally am involved in alot basketball track and field soccer and sometimes double dutch and the vibe i get from the student and teachers is just so nice makes me want to keep going stronger.', 'Weather its soccer, track&field, basketball, double dutch ect... the level of support the teachers and students give to one another is just so amazing that its som,ething you have to talk about the next day in school. The students know the commentment level that school grades have to 75 and higher if not they work with you.', "The principal is always at her best even if her day is not going good she always has a smile her and her staff even if the worst kids walked in they don't treat them differently but with respect and patients", 'they started a program that help females take test for pregnancy and give out birth control.and many other hep to the students so the drop out rate can decrease and they always tell and teach kids about safe sex', 'The moment you walk in to school theres just joy that just fills the room and the teachers may be having bad days but still have it in them to set aside whats bugging them and move forward with the topic. i would select this school over because of the great school spirit.']

column2: ["This school as so amazing...one of the best I have ever attended. The teachers care about students and go above and beyond for each and everyone. the after school programs are great and centered around what the student would like for it to be. Chess club, gamers club, yearbook you name it- they have it or can create it. They also have a field studies program that runs Tuesday's and Thursday's and it allows for your child to explore the city and learn about different religions and cultures. This is one of the best things as it opens a Childs eyes to other ideas than they know.", 'One thing I liked about Lyons Community School is the sense of community I got from the school. The teachers care about the well being of all their students and they are not their to just teach.', 'I like the teacher to student experience and the overall method of learning but could receive a few improvements here and there.', "Lyons is not you average school, even though I gave it an average rate. What made me fall in love in love with Lyons and stayed from 6th grade until graduation this upcoming year, is that there is so much love in the atmosphere. The teachers really care about you and how well you do in classes. They try to make learning a fun experience and remember-able . What I also love about Lyons is the program called PGC that they have installed into the freshman's lives. PGC means Peer Group Connection. The program consist of selected 18 students from either junior or senior year who spend their time in and out of the 9th grade classrooms helping them adapt to high school and being an older brother or sister to them. What I dislike about Lyons Community School most is that I feel that some kids get more attention in class and leeway when it comes to the rules. In order for us to grow up and become responsible and advocate for ourselves we must face the consequences that are placed.", "Pro:The teachers are great educators and understanding people. Con:The school work isn't challenging for some students.", 'Lyons Community School is a really nice school.The teachers are there for you and the teacher and student relationship is really awesome.', 'some school safty, feel pretty safe only sirtent situations  i did not', 'I like that I am able to express myself and not really be judged', 'the teachers are very respectful but at times have there moments', 'the extracurriculars at my school are not really taken sceraously seriously, excpect for bascketball nothing else really exsist', 'they do have sports and teams but they only sport most common sports but not other sports', 'they focus on the students participations and habit and they also look for the students efforts', "teachers know what they're doing, they have many strategies  to make the class fun, and to bring the student's attention.", "Because they have fair amount of of after-school activities and there's a greater opportunities to enter one, also to enter a school or class committees", 'these policies are great because they help the students to the better. Also the school are very strict on these policies.', 'they help on most of the issues that the students have.', 'Cafeteria options are very healthy and have a lot of options.', 'No peer pressure at all. The acceptance is always granted. Ethnic and racial diversity and sexual orientation is accepted and is very very diverse.', 'I was very prepared for the real world.', 'My school is very strict with their rules and they try to make sure that the students follow them']

column1: The Maxine Greene High School for Imaginative Inquiry
column2: ["I would rate Maxine Greene a poor school due to the administration bring the school down as a whole.The teachers are treated terribly they're often placed to teach subjects they don't have a degree on. All of the school money goes to furniture for the main office. Students often ask for college trips, school spirit activities, more teachers, better resources. Requests aren't usually met due to lack of proper administration.", "The Maxine Greene High School For Imaginative Inquiry is a fairly good school but would not recommend for everyone. There is a strict no electronics policy, your phone is allowed but it goes in a pouch with your name and pouch number at the top and stays in the hands of the authority all day long. The security is tight really tight, the lunch could be more edible,pleasant and acceptable, the teachers are wonderful, fun, outgoing individuals who do their outmost best to teach everyone and ensure that they understand. The school is a no bully zone, for some reason fun activities isn't allowed (bringing costumes on Halloween). I feel like the guidance counselors really push forward especially for the seniors (college preparedness, graduation, good grades etc). All in all it's not a bad school, could be better.", "I've shared a lot of unforgettable experiences at this school that I will always hold close to my heart. However, as I have progressed from my freshman year to my senior year I noticed a lack of funds as well as laziness that has greatly hindered the performance of the school.", 'I have a love and hate relationship with the High School for Arts, Imagination, and Inquiry (recently changed to Maxine Greene HS).  I took the position of Student Government President and immediately began to jot down ideas of things that I wanted to do to make the students feel more inclusive, especially for the diverse pool of students who often felt miscommunication between staff. I wanted to do fundraisers, I wanted to do murals, and while doing these events I wanted to do something that everyone who attended our school would enjoy and participate in.', 'As a student from freshman year here, i can say that my overall experience was good. As there are many people there are many personalities in which you may connect or either disagree with. The teachers are great , the classes they teach are great . I feel as if the classes prepare you for college and that they care about your future education.', "4 years in this school I've faced many academic challenges but the teachers I had made me push myself harder and I couldn't thank them enough", "I completed four years in this high school and it was not the best experience. However, it's conditions improved from my Freshman to Senior year.  The environment my freshman year was very overwhelming. There were a lot of illegal and unsafe activities going on in hallways, staircases and around campus. Teachers did not control the disturbances in their classrooms; everyone seemed unmotivated to go to school or even teach. In addition, there were no clubs or extracurricular activities in this high school my freshman and sophomore year.   This seemed to be more steady and stable as the years went on. By my junior-senior year lockers were added, new elective courses and clubs were also added to this high school.", 'The teachers all genuinely care about their students which made my high school experience a lot better. I was able to come across a lot of different people and they strived to get us as many opportunities as possible.', 'Many of the students have gotten bullied in and outside of the classrooms. No one really acts out on it. There have been several physical altercations in the hallways, but security always act fast and try to control it.', 'There are so many different after school clubs to join. During the school day, there are very very few extracurricular classes. Many of the interesting extracurriculars where cut off this school year. Many students were disappointed in that.', 'Many teachers genuinely care about a students grades and emotions. If teachers see that something is wrong they try to help or try to understand. However, during class there are some teachers that lose patience very easily and automatically tell students to get out of the classroom and just send them to the deans office.', "High School for Arts, Imagination and Inquiry is a very small school. However, students, teachers, and staff are very united when it comes to academics. If a student asks for help either with school work or personal problems, teachers and staff are willing to use their own time to assist these students with their needs. Most of the teachers however are very autocratic and don't really allow students to give in their own creative ideas for lessons. There should be more foreign language classes to help students achieve an advanced regents diploma. Also, more electives would engage students to do well in classes.", 'The academics thats offered at this school are thr basic class subjects nothing extra added lile.design , drama, technology etc its limited. Most teachers are very nice and engaged in what they teach and build relationships with students but there are a few that arent into what there assigned to at all, class scheduling sometimes is uneccesary they will give student classes that isnt needed , a waste of students time , the work.load was managable enough to undestand the topic that was taught for the day. Study options werent available really had to study on own terms and there was only one really popular class which was advisory because the teacher was.awesome and students were able to reflect on putside topics and personal.life issues  through writing.', 'Bullying is noticed in this school but nothing is really done much it always seems to get out of hand and the students have to defend for then selves until the security gaurds come to break up the fight .The saftey team in this school is great and they do protect the building and always request id ,but the behavior of students most of the time cannot be controlled until after a fight breaks out.', 'My overall experience at this school was good and bad . The good part was certain classes i truly enjoyed because i was naturally interested in the subjects , i also enjoyed the holiday partys in the school including the bake sales we use to participate and the assemblys where special guests from other schools and organizations would come and perform. The bad parts were some teachers were very rude and had a lack of respect and intrest for the subject they were teaching and the students as well which made it discouraging .', 'There are a few teachers who truly makes class enjoyable and always had something planned that was fun and made us students want to participate. The teachers also helped one on one during class which was a great thing , but there where some teachers that were frusrtated and didnt make the lesson interesting mostly teach and complete our worksheets. Grading sometimes would get mixed up due to teachers losing students.completed class work , but.most of the time grading was fair.', "My school has great health and safety policies. And one way to enforce those policies is with the students. My school has a program called circle facilitator that is conducted by students. Sometimes a student doesn't want to talk to a teacher about their personal problems so they can just talk to a circle facilitator and they will help them the best way they can.", 'The extracurricular opportunities in my school would be the AP classes. My school offers AP History and AP government which are college level classes. Those classes give us the full blown experience of how college works. It also allows us to gain college credits while being a high school student.', 'The teachers at my school are the best. They have become my second family for all the hard work they did for me and the other students. They really care about what happens in our life and want the best for us. They connection I have with my teachers is very personal. If I have question I can call email them at any time of the day and they will response right away.', 'This school is the best because of all the programs it has to offer. They have a class called Virtual Enterprises which is a business class. That class gives students the an idea of how it feels to run a business and also the sense of how adulthood id like. It gives students the opportunity to travel to other countries and meet other VE students and their business.']
column4: ["I would rate Maxine Greene a poor school due to the administration bring the school down as a whole.The teachers are treated terribly they're often placed to teach subjects they don't have a degree on. All of the school money goes to furniture for the main office. Students often ask for college trips, school spirit activities, more teachers, better resources. Requests aren't usually met due to lack of proper administration.", "The Maxine Greene High School For Imaginative Inquiry is a fairly good school but would not recommend for everyone. There is a strict no electronics policy, your phone is allowed but it goes in a pouch with your name and pouch number at the top and stays in the hands of the authority all day long. The security is tight really tight, the lunch could be more edible,pleasant and acceptable, the teachers are wonderful, fun, outgoing individuals who do their outmost best to teach everyone and ensure that they understand. The school is a no bully zone, for some reason fun activities isn't allowed (bringing costumes on Halloween). I feel like the guidance counselors really push forward especially for the seniors (college preparedness, graduation, good grades etc). All in all it's not a bad school, could be better.", "I've shared a lot of unforgettable experiences at this school that I will always hold close to my heart. column6: ['I have felt prisoner my entire attendance here.', 'The food services are at the bare minimum.', 'Students often get in trouble for minor offenses.', 'Soccer is the only activity that is truly supported.', 'Teachers are always available to help after school', 'Not many students join clubs and many end up cut.', 'This school was pretty great with diversity and acceptance. No one judges, or thinks of themselves as "highly." Peer pressure is rarely introduced, but it is mostly in freshmen groups, which is normally handled by discussing certain traits in a classroom circle.  Student involvement is okay, not great. Most of the times, everyone is heading out the doors after school, not getting involved. There are absolutely no problems towards ethnicity or race-- every one is for the most part open minded.', "The soccer team for my school was 15 times winning champions, so that's pretty important on increasing the school spirit and the overall team's performance. Fan support is normally not an issue. Student involvement is shaky, most times, it's the same people trying out for a team. On the other hand, athletic facilities are ok; the gym is big and clean, most of the times. But we do not have fitness programs.", 'Coming to college made me realize that high school barely prepared me for a lot of things. Like writing, and how important it is not to plagiarize! I remember so many people doing it in highschool, just because I doubt it we knew what it meant. Also, the lack training on how to be a better writer; but most importantly knowing how to communicate with other people-- professionally. Which I had to learn within the first two weeks of school.', 'Every year we have a Anti-Bullying Month.', 'Many teachers communicate very well with students.', 'Many students interact with each other.', 'Teachers are willing to help many students.', 'We have no science labs.', 'Many students support certain sports.', 'Not many students are committed to the clubs.', 'Many students accept each other,', 'the cafeteria serve the same food almost every day.', 'The school is very very strict upon dress code.', "I do not like this school. I wouldn't recommend."]

column2: ['i would like for them to worry less about uniform and worry more about preparing us for college my experience in ase was good and a life lesson at times  we learn off of each other mistakes and grow from it i was even in a program called peer leaders where we would be role model for the freshman students to help transform them from middle school to high school and make sure there going on the right path in high school the program really makes a huge impact on the freshman because we were like bigger brothers and sisters to them so that they wouldnt feel alone during there freshman year not only did it benefit them it also benefit us this program gave me  a reason to come to school it made me be on time and made me improve in school because as role model whatever we do they freshman copy so i had to push myself to be a great leader and example to them', "Academy for Scholarship And Entrepreneurship is a really good school. Moving from another country i didn't believe that i could get along with the teachers and students on my first day of school. The teachers put in much effort to make sure that we are on the road to graduation. The prepare us for our regents too. Its a really good school. One thing i would like to change is the fact that when school parties are being organised songs from our different diversity should be played so that everyone would feel equal and happy. Academy for Scholarship And Entrepreneurship is opened to every race. If i were to choose a high school over and over again i would always choose ASE because it is my second home. A place where i was trained and educated to be the lady i am today. Academy for Scholarship And Entrepreneurship is the best.", 'The Academy for Scholarship and Entrepreneurship was a good experience. The teachers were helpful and the rules were enforced. There was a lack of sports teams seeing that it is a small school but other than that A.S.E is a good school that looks out for their students.', 'I enjoyed my high school experience. I made a lot of life long friends and even met the love of my life there', 'Academy for Scholarship and Entrepreneurship has potential to be a great school although the majority of students there are giving the school a terribly bad reputation.', 'This school is a really good school. There is discipline and respect for both teachers and student. There are also really good teachers. And these teachers make sure you understand there subject. They give you the opportunity to become who you want to be. And that is good.', 'Overall the school is a good School. Teachers are great, personally I had great opportunities. Like trips, scholarships and connections to colleges. The school partners with a few colleges for college courses for students.', 'I liked the teachers i formed a good relationship with, i like that i started at 6th grade and ended in 12th grade', 'This was a very interesting school.  Nice teachers and staff and taught you many different things.  Those who worked there were always very helpful and it was easy to get around.', 'The school is very small and disorganized.  The teachers are bias and have favorites whom they help more than others.   The faculty care more about whether the uniform policy is followed than students actually being in class.  The students care more about appearance, cliques and the next trending thing than actually completing work.', 'Overall, my experience at this school was poor. There are rules the principals try to enforce that is unfair to some students. For instance, the bathrooms are always locked and you need someone to always open it. The one great thing about this school is that there are some amazing teachers that care about their students', 'Great school if students care about their education. Teachers go out of their way to help students. I have teachers who went above and beyond to help me. Ms. Whiteman and Ms. Dale has helped me and they help other students.', 'I feel like this school has really brought down my standards, I know now that education throughout NYC  is not the same!!!', 'Academy for Scholarship and Entrepreneurship was a great school. I met great people  during my time here, you are taught accordingly and you get the best experiences throughout your time there.', 'This school is okay. It would be much more exciting if they had different clubs and organizations for students after school. Everyday after school, I felt weird just going straight home and not participating in anything that I loved to do, like newspaper editing, dance, etc. One of my favorite experiences in high school was the Step Team in 10th grade. I was excited to join again in the following year, but there was no faculty to run the program so it diminished.', 'Every teacher is different. Some of the teachers are never available after class or after school when you need them. When the bell rings for the end of the day, the teachers rush out the school building without staying an extra 5 or 10 minutes in case a student has a issue. On a good note, the teachers are very passionate about the subject they teach. They show up to school with smiles on their faces. Their smiles provide a heart warming environment for students.', 'The extracurricular activities in this school is diverse provding the student faculity with a lot of options.', 'The health and safety policies in this school is quite excellent and prominent and the environment seems safe.', 'The academic stand point of this school is wonderful and they students have quite a slew of options regarding classes and teachers. The assignments are quite handful but straight forward, yet, thought provoking and mind enriching.', 'The health and security policies in this school is wonderful and the environment is sanitary.']

column6: ['The sports teams in this school are quite competitive and excellent.', "The reason I rated this schoo as okay are for a few justifications and issues. Firstly, it's quite a different school in the sense that it enforces the rule of the students wearing the proper school uniform and dressing appropriate for school. Yet, this school need some improvements in the areas of offering extracurricular activities for the students. And also providing more options aside of business and entrepreneurship Ap classes although the school is business based but not every single student wants to major in business.", "It's just like another middle school in terms if extracurricular activities. \r The classes are standard and the students have no choice in their schedule and next to none in effecting the school", "I don't go to lunch anymore, so I wouldn't know.", "Our principal does not know what is going on and most of all, doesn't communicate with students, especially the senior class.", "There are limited opportunities for sports....it's just basketball.", 'I love my teachers, except for a few of them. My teachers always encourage me to strive towards my goals and work hard.', 'The NYJTL Program has extended extracurricular activities towards students which include lacrosse, basketball, film, drama, fashion, vocal, dance, etc.', 'School nurse is always available.', 'My school food service would be rated as average.', 'My school is very strict on uniform.', 'My school lacks the ability to have school spirit and make sure that students are engaged in activities.', 'Most teachers at my school are very knowledgeable and make sure students are excelling academically as well as growing.', 'it was okay, safe that was the good part', 'I would do high school are over again because of my experience and the amazing trips giving by the school.', 'it was average like any other school', 'their punishment were harsh but good for the bad students', 'The teachers cared about our education.', 'while attending this school is wish there was more outside activities and organization.', 'I strongly believe the administration did their part in prepare the students for college. The only way as students can be prepared for the "real world" if we experience for our self.']

column1: Cobble Hill School of American Studies
column2: ['My experience at cobble hill of American studies was interesting. I learned a lot about the environment of the school. Many teachers were good and made sure I stayed focus throughout the year. Although there were many problems throughout my 4 years going there I managed to stay focus and strive to get my diploma in June 2019.', 'My experience At Cobble Hill was Good. I personally liked the school a lot, there’s many trips and the teachers care about your learning. However this is a very small school with not so great sports and clubs.', 'When people start high school they’re usually so excited. They can’t wait to experience everything that comes with being in high school.  Everyone says that high school is the best four years of your life. Now that I’ve graduated, I can’t say they were my best years but I can say they were my most educational years of my life. I wouldn’t say that they weren’t fun because they were hilarious.  B when I say educational, I mean I’ve learned so much about myself and about life. I learned what the words family, love, betrayal and life meant. All these events changed me, and I’m glad they happened because it helped me grow as a person.', 'I enjoy the college readiness preparation, as well as the many opportunities provided to me, such as the educational trips, avid program, supplies offered for maximum learning experience.', 'Cobble Hill High School Is A School Where You Can Explore All Your Options ! It’s Very Active In Events , Wants To See Their Studens Excel And Graduate On Time Or Early', 'Very small school with staff members who strive to make sure students achieve success.  I think the best part of it is that they are always on top of us to do our best. Every possible way for improvement is given to us, and its like we are all a family. The level of challenges are easy to over come because of the constant reminder that persistent is key', 'My experience at cobble Hill wasn’t What I hoped for . They said that they had a lot of activities and sports for the females which was a lie.Most of the sports were for males. The students are failing and no body is helping them get back up by providing extra help. The school has a lot of favoritism, and that upsets many students. The Board of ED is thinking about shutting this school down.', 'The staff,students, and administration are all friendly and very helpful. The teachers are always there for you and help you with your academics when they see you falling behind, and the college readiness program helps nervous students feel more at ease once they begin their college process. Overall, these last four years attending Cobble Hill Highschool of American Studies has made me proud of and helped to shape me into the person that I have become today.', 'I came to Cobble Hill at the start of my senior year. Overall, I thought it was an average school, there want anything extremely special about it.  Some teacher were actually invested in helping students learn, while other didn\'t particularly care to much. The principal was a dictator She often null and void any idea the senior class presented to her, therefore I didn\'t get the actual "Senior Experience."  In accordance to environment was the school is okay. The building is small and the students are rowdy. School sponsors allowed us to go on trip to Washington and Six Flag, all of which were paid for. They also had access to go equipment for educational purposes like Macbooks and printers. I was able to do work, surf the internet and even use the printer. The school definitely makes sure you have access to things you need in order to be successful.', 'I attended Cobble Hill High School for the past four years and I come to realize that this school is Just like any other school in Brooklyn.', "Cobble Hill was actually not a bad school to attend. I received a really good education here and I was fortunate enough to bond with a lot of my teachers. Since it is a small school, there are not many options when it comes to things like sports, and academic diversity. One downside was that you don't really get prepared for college until the end of your Junior year into your Senior year. They focus a lot on SAT prep and applying to State University of New York (SUNY) and City University of New York (CUNY) because there are fee waivers for those schools. The counselors do not really prepare you on how to apply to colleges out of state and as a result I did not apply to any. I would say, I was not completely ready for college despite having a good GPA. College prep was definitely lacking when I was a student there.", "Cobble Hill needs improvement in teacher to student relationships. Most students in the school don't follow rules. They smoke and participate in gang activities. This school is not safe for students who care about their education.", 'What I like about Cobble is its college readiness for its students.  The guidance counselor pushes their students to the limits of staying in school, taking all of their regents, and encouraging them to pass all of their classes. What I like to see change is for the school to have more sports activities and more involvemtne after school programs.', 'Cobble Hill is a small school however they are a lot of great things such as great teachers, administration and safety staff. Me as senior, I experienced a lot in the school, teachers make sure that you college ready and for the real world.', 'The teachers cared for your education. However , they babied us and didn’t prepare us for college nor did they prepare us well enough for the NYS regents.', 'Cobble Hill High School of American Studies is a small community, and you can only get the best out of it, if you make the best oust out of every single opportunity offered. If your specified grade counselor refers yo to a well known or national program join it! You can wait for things to be handed to you in this school, you have to inquire about them.', 'Attending Cobble Hill School of American Studies has certainly been a great experience. From the classrooms to the teachers, the learning experience I have been able to go through was tremendous help and has led me on a path where I am destined for greater things. Although, the work may be tough, the teachers are understanding enough to make sure that all of their students are on the same level of comprehension in order for everyone to succeed in that learning environment.', 'At Cobble Hill high school my experience was ok and it could definitely have been better. What I enjoyed about the school was the different after school activities that they offered. The clubs I really enjoyed were the crochet club, moot court and mock trial. Even though the school had good after schools activities however they lacked of treating the students like we were students other than money fro the state. Teachers had to pay out of pocket to buy us stuff and when I was in the 12th grade every student had a mandatory full schedule. A lot of students were giving classes they did not need. A teacher told me that the new principle did that to us because the school receive money with every class a student is taking.', 'I do have to say that my experience has been very positive...although not one of the top rated schools, I applied myself so that I can be a top rated student. I did my best knowing that my education was my top priority. I had some really great teachers who had my best interest at heart and wanted to ensure that I was successful. I am graduating with an over 85 average and that I am very proud of.', 'Staff was beyond helpful to me as a transfer student. The atmosphere was welcoming. I would like to see more diversity in the type of teachers and implementation of new programs that will help high school students focus on their future career path early.']
column4: ['My experience at cobble hill of American studies was interesting. I learned a lot about the environment of the school. Many teachers were good and made sure I stayed focus throughout the year. Although there were many problems throughout my 4 years going there I managed to stay focus and strive to get my diploma in June 2019.', 'My experience At Cobble Hill was Good. I personally liked the school a lot, there’s many trips and the teachers care about your learning. However this is a very small school with not so great sports and clubs.', 'When people start high school they’re usually so excited. They can’t wait to experience everything that comes with being in high school.  Everyone says that high school is the best four years of your life. Now that I’ve graduated, I can’t say they were my best years but I can say they were my most educational years of my life. I wouldn’t say that they weren’t fun because they were hilarious.  B when I say educational, I mean I’ve learned so much about myself and about life. I learned what the words family, love, betrayal and life meant. All these events changed me, and I’m glad they happened because it helped me grow as a person.', 'I enjoy the college readiness preparation, as well as the many opportunities provided to me, such as the educational trips, avid program, supplies offered for maximum learning experience.', 'Cobble Hill High School Is A School Where You Can Explore All Your Options ! column6: ['My experience with cobble hill high school was good. A lot of teachers was involved with the clubs and all activities the school has. Overall there was no issues or things that was wrong with cobble hill', 'Kids come into school at 9:00 am just to skip school at around 12:00pm', 'There is no actives to do after school, no sports, no lockers and NO phones', 'Other than the rude students the academics are great. The staff really try and help with problems during the school years. The teachers never give up on a respectful school and when you ask for help they are more than happy to do so', "At cobble hill it is evident that the parents of most of the students don't care if their child makes it to school on time or if their child pays attention in class which makes the teachers jobs harder. There are students that genuinely do the right thing, those are the students who's parents want them to do well", "The teacher at Cobble Hill truly try their hardest to get student to participate and understand. Although at times it is unsuccessful that doesn't stop them from trying again", 'Academics is strongly STRESSED to the children', 'my child does not participate', 'Like the policy & practice@the school', "The Staff is VERY involved w'the Children \r I Am PLEASED with the School", 'Students are devoted to their work. They may have their stumbles but the teachers are there to support and help them.', 'Cobble Hill is an exemplary school that helps students surpass their own educational development. Although i may have come flaws the community helps teaches the kids the true meaning of what life is about. Not only do students learn from the remarkable teachers they learn form the students. Life lessons are brought about and used in many ways. School is given a thumbs up by me.', 'Most teacher and school staffs are very supporting and helpful.', "The teachers really help the kids even though  some kids are really disrespectful and ungrateful full they still help them pass, tje teachers also stay for after schollschool even though the kids that need help don't show up most of thw time but they still stay just in case", 'They have a clubs such as chorus, step team, moot court which am in and is really fun and is helping me figure out if i really want to do law in college.', 'You can take a few teachers seriously.', 'The principal is alright but has problem with the kids because attitude problem. Otherwise she alright.\r Guidance Counselors are great they care for your academics, and well being. \r Teachers are okay, there is a handful you can really learn from and take seriously. But there is a handful that can be pushed around.\r Office staff are good they will help with any questions you have.\r Bullying is not displayed in the school but they are students that like to talk.\r There is a very casual dress code with a few restrictions.\r If you get in a fight you get suspended for 2 or 3 days.', "The schools air- conditioning and heating system is great. Now to get resources in our school is pretty hard. Its a mixture for the condition of my school. I wouldn't be able to rate it on a 1 to 5 scale!", "Theirs opportunities to be involved in fitness programs. you do need to go for try-outs though for sports in our school. you aren't guaranteed a spot on the team.", 'they have certain activities that can keep kids off the streets for an extra 2 to 3 hours. but the membership dies out in 2 to 3 months.']
